GR14muktacau:7: uditaṃ taṃ śacī-garbha-vyomni pūrṇaṃ vidhuṃ bhaje ||
GR14muktacau:8: nāma-śreṣṭhaṃ manum api śacīputram atra svarūpaṃ śrī-rūpaṃ tasyāgrajam uru-purīṃ māthurīṃ goṣṭhavāṭīm |
GR14muktacau:10: prāpto yasya prathita-kṛpayā śrī-guruṃ taṃ nato'smi ||
GR14muktacau:15: latās tā madhurāḥ kasmin jāyante dhanyanivṛti |
GR14muktacau:17: [* This verse is quoted in UN 11.66 as an example of maugdhya. There the first line
GR14muktacau:18: kās tā latāḥ kva vā santi kena vā kila ropitāḥ]
GR14muktacau:19: tatas tad-vṛttānta-smaraṇāt kṛṣṇaḥ svāntar-glānir bahir vihasyāha |
GR14muktacau:20: gataḥ sa kālo yatrāsīt muktānāṃ janma valliṣu |
GR14muktacau:22: tatas tad apūrvaṃ śrutvā sa-viśeṣa-śravaṇotkaṇṭhitayā tayā bāḍham āmreḍitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ punar āha |
GR14muktacau:30: gopyaḥ kila prasādhita-sadanā ātmanāṃ bhūṣaṇārthaṃ nānālaṅkāra-saṃskāra-sādhana-parā
GR14muktacau:34: mayā ca vicakṣaṇa iti yathārtha-nāma-kīra-kumāra-mukhatas tan niśamya sa-kautukaṃ tatra gatvātipremāspadasya haṃsī-hariṇīti nāmno
GR14muktacau:36: bhūṣaṇautsukyena tāsāṃ sakāśe mauktikāni prārthitāni || tataḥ
GR14muktacau:38: āñcalena sāvahelanam iva manāg eva mām avalokya
GR14muktacau:40: nirbharāveśa-viśeṣeṇa hārādi-gumphana-vilāsam eva vitanvatīs tāḥ prati sasmitam idam aham ābhāṣitavān |
GR14muktacau:42: vaguṇṭhita-karṇyaḥ! priya-vayasyasya mama prārthite kṣaṇam api karṇān udghāṭayantu bhavatyaḥ
GR14muktacau:43: tatas tāsām īṣat smitvānyonyam ālokayantīnāṃ madhye pragalbhā lalitā vihasya saroṣam iva vyājahāra
GR14muktacau:46: tava mahiṣīnām evālaṅkriyāyai satyam abhirūpāṇi kathaṃ na dāsyāmaḥ ?
GR14muktacau:47: tatas tad-vacaḥ śrutvā mayā kautukenāviṣṭena sāmnā punaḥ punar idam evoktam |
GR14muktacau:48: bhoḥ priya-bhūṣaṇāḥ! sarvāṇi yadi na deyāni tadā mad-atyanta-priya-dhenu-yugala-śṛṅga-paryāptāny evāvaśyaṃ dīyantām |
GR14muktacau:49: tato lalitā sarvāsāṃ mauktikāni punaḥ punaś cālayantī bhūyaḥ prāha |
GR14muktacau:52: kiṃ kartavyam ? tava dhenu-yogyam ekam api nāsti |
GR14muktacau:57: paścāt tvayā vaktuṃ na śakya ity upālabhya satvaram ambāṃ vrajeśvarīm āgatya mātar dehi me mauktikāni |
GR14muktacau:58: ahaṃ tu tāni kṛṣṭa-kedārikāyām eva vapsyāmīti punaḥ punar avocam |
GR14muktacau:62: mātar avaśyam eva dīyantāṃ dina-trayābhyantare prarūḍhāni bhavaty eva sākṣāt kartavyānīty asman-nirbandha-parihārāsamarthayā tayā dattāni bahūni mauktikāni |
GR14muktacau:64: yamunopakaṇṭhe pauruṣa-trayam avagāḍhāṃ kedarikāṃ niṣpādya sahāsaṃ paśyantīṣu kāsucid gopikāsu tany uptvā sā punar apūri |
GR14muktacau:65: parito vṛtiś ca kāṣṭhair niviḍā kṛtā |
GR14muktacau:66: tatas tāsāṃ mauktikaprārthanvacanāsvaranirāsārthaṃ kedārikāsekāya vayasadvārā gavyeṣu prārthyamāneṣu solluṇṭhaṃ vihasya tāḥ procuḥ |
GR14muktacau:70: iti śrutvā mayā svagṛhāṇāṃ gavāṃ bahubhiḥ payobhireva tā darśayatā pratyahaṃ sekaḥ kriyate sma |
GR14muktacau:72: taddarśanenollasitena mayā māturañcalaṃ gṛhītvānīya tadaṅkurā darśitāḥ |
GR14muktacau:73: tān dṛṣṭvā tu mātā kimetaditi manasi vicārayantī sandigdhā satī vrajaṃ jagāma |
GR14muktacau:74: gopyas tu tacchrutvā hiṃsrā latāḥ prarūḍhā iti parasparaṃ sahāsamūcire |
GR14muktacau:75: tato nātivilambena mūrvākāriṇyastā mauktikalatā vistāriṇyaḥ samālocya samīpavartināṃ kadambānāmupariṣṭhāt krameṇāvarohitāḥ |
GR14muktacau:76: tataḥ katipayairdivasaistāḥ saurabhonmāditamadhuvrataiḥ kusumanicayairgopīnāṃ camatkāramātanvānāḥ sakalaṃ gokulamevādhyavasāyan |
GR14muktacau:77: tato'ṣṭa-vidha-yonija-mauktikebhyo vilakṣaṇāṃ śriyaṃ dadhati muktāphalāni tāsu jātāni tāni dṛṣṭvā vraja-vāsināṃ vismayo'tyarthaṃ jātaḥ |
GR14muktacau:79: tataḥ praty aham eva tad-darśanena jāta-lobhās tāḥ mantrayāñcakrire |
GR14muktacau:80: bhoḥ sakhyaḥ bhadrena jñātam asmabhyaḥ kṛṣṇo mauktikāni sarvathaiva na dāsyatyeva |
GR14muktacau:83: tatrānadhyavasāyaṃ tyaktvā tad-dviguṇikāyāḥ kedārikāyayā ārambhaḥ kathaṃ
GR14muktacau:85: iti śrutvāticaturā lalitā prāha -- bhoḥ pavana-vyādhi-vyāpṛtā gopyaḥ!
GR14muktacau:88: tena yad añjasā kriyate tat kila mahā-siddhato
GR14muktacau:92: katham etāvatī śaktiḥ svataḥ sambhaved iti jānantyo'pi bhavatyaḥ
GR14muktacau:96: siddha-mantram ekam ādāya kathaṃ na tathodyamaḥ kriyate ?
GR14muktacau:97: sarvāḥ -- bhadraṃ vadati tuṅgavidyeti nirṇīya tat-pārśvam upetya
GR14muktacau:102: bāḍham akasmād asmād dṛśāṃ bhāgyātiśaya-vaśāt sākṣād bīja-rūpo'yam
GR14muktacau:106: yathā sa tarus tvaritam eva praūḍhaḥ phalavān bhaved iti manasi vicintya sāntarānandaṃ nāndī prāha --
GR14muktacau:108: satyaṃ mukundasya na mantra-kṛteyaṃ mṛdi mauktikā sṛṣṭiḥ |
GR14muktacau:109: sarvāḥ - tan nija-janena kāraṇa-śuktyādi-mātram antareṇa kathaṃ mṛttikāyām
GR14muktacau:114: vraja-vana-bhūr iti śrī-bhagavatī-pāda-padmaiḥ punaḥ punar nivarṇyate |
GR14muktacau:118: -nānā-phalādimanto hiraṇmaya-mahīruhāḥ sphuṭam atra jātā jāyamānāś ca dṛśyante |
GR14muktacau:119: ato'syām upta-muktāphalāni janiṣyante phaliṣyanti ceti kiṃ citram ? tad bhavatībhir api surabhitara-navanītādi-seka-pūrvakam atiprayatnena tathā tat-kṛṣiḥ
GR14muktacau:120: kriyatāṃ yathā tato'py adhikatamāni paramottama-phalāni labhyante |
GR14muktacau:121: iti tad-vacana-mādhurīm āpīya sa-santoṣaṃ sa-ślāghaṃ pratyayantyaḥ sarvās tām āliṅgya nijāṃ sthalīm āgatya spardhayā maj-jayāya samucita-vetanato
GR14muktacau:123_0: kṛtvā peṭikāyām agrathitāni grathitāny aṅga-bhūṣaṇa-rūpāṇi ca yāvanti sthitāni tāvanti yathā-yuktam alpāny eva saṃrakṣyāṅgataḥ
GR14muktacau:123_1: samuttāritāni ca mauktikāni niravaśeṣam uptvā pratyaham eva tri-sandhyaṃ
GR14muktacau:130: tataḥ katipayadināntare svasvakedārikāsu jātān hiṃsralatāṅkurān dṛṣṭvā antargarbhitagarvābhirvallabhībhistābhiḥ sarvābhiśchalato matpriyavayasyāḥ parihasyante sma |
GR14muktacau:131: ekasmin dine gorasānāmatīvavyayaṃ svasvagṛhasya ca nimauktikatāṃ vīkṣya gopāḥ sasaṃrambhaṃ kāraṇaṃ papracchuḥ |
GR14muktacau:135: kṛto mauktikakedārikānāṃ nimittaṃ bahulo vyayo'cirādeva bahutaralābho bhaviṣyati |
GR14muktacau:136: yatkṛṣṇakedārikāyāṃ rājadārāṇāmapi durlabhāni muktāphalāni kila dṛṣṭāni santīti |
GR14muktacau:137: athaikadā viśākhayā svadekārikāsu tānaṅkurānnirīkṣya kāsāñcit karṇe nibhṛtamidamuktam |
GR14muktacau:139: kṛṣṇakedārikāmadhye mayā yādṛśā aṅkurā dṛṣṭā ete tu tādṛśā na dṛśyante |
GR14muktacau:142: atha katipayadivasaistāsāṃ rādhādīnāmanyāsāṃ ca kedārikāsu kaṇṭakādicihnena latābhirnijarūpe prakāśyamāne gopīkedārikāsu hiṃsrā latā jātā iti sakalagokula eva khyātam |
GR14muktacau:143: etad ākarṇya vayasya-dvārā gāndharvā-goṣṭhyāṃ mayedaṃ sotprāsaṃ vijñāpitaṃ
GR14muktacau:144: śrutaṃ bhavatīnāṃ kedārikāsu bahūni muktā-phalāni jātāni santi |
GR14muktacau:145: ahaṃ tāvat snigdhas tat sa-vayasyāya mahyaṃ prathama-phalāni dīyantām |
GR14muktacau:147: yadi vayaṃ kṛṣim akariṣyāmas tadā sakala-goṣṭhaṃ
GR14muktacau:151: tad ākarṇya mayā nikhila-vayasyāḥ savatsā gāvaḥ śakaṭa-vahā mahiṣyaḥ,
GR14muktacau:152: savarkarā ajā, vṛndāvana-vartinyaś ca mauktika-mayair mālādy-alaṅkārair
GR14muktacau:154: tataś ca gopyo lajjayā sva-bhūṣaṇa-vyatirekeṇa bahu-dhana-vināśena
GR14muktacau:155: gopa-bhiyā ca kim atra yuktam iti mantrayitum ārebhire |
GR14muktacau:157: dhūrta-nāndīmukhyā'bhadreṇa pratāritāḥ sma ity ābhāṣya sarps.aṃ
GR14muktacau:159: āgatya tat-kathana-pūrvakaṃ bahuśas tābhir bhartsitā nāndīmukhī prāha |
GR14muktacau:160: bhoḥ tapobhyaḥ śape na mayā sarvathaiva pratāritāḥ stha, kintu yuṣmābhir eva
GR14muktacau:166: savayasya-gaṇasya tasya śravaṇa-kuhare suṣṭhu-gocarīkṛtya kedārikāsu muktāḥ sphuṭam uptāḥ tathā ko'py ekaḥ prahariko'pi tatra na rakṣitaḥ |
GR14muktacau:170: yuṣmān vijetum abhīṣṭam iṣṭānna-pradānena suṣṭhu pralobhya dhūrta-guruṇā yuṣman-nāgareṇa
GR14muktacau:171: tena prerita-lolupa-bhaṇḍa-madhumaṅgalenāti-nirbaddhato vicitya kiñcij jātāṅkurāḥ sarvā muktā niravaśeṣaṃ samādāya tatra tatra
GR14muktacau:173: samāropya kayatyaḥ pṛthak svakṛta ekasmin kedāre pratnataḥ saṃropitāḥ |
GR14muktacau:186: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ tām ākṣipya sva-geham
GR14muktacau:187: āgatya punaḥ punas tad eva vicārayantī tāsu rādhā bhoḥ sakhyaḥ nāndīmukhī vā pratārayatu sa dhūrtas tathā vā karotu adhunā tad-vicāreṇa ko lābhaḥ |
GR14muktacau:190: tad vayaṃ tu tebhyo mauktikeṣu darśiteṣv eva śithilī bhavet |
GR14muktacau:191: tādṛśāni sarvathaivātra sudurlabhāni kintu kṛṣṇād eva mūlyena yathā gṛhītāni syuḥ |
GR14muktacau:195: suvarṇāni gṛhītvā gatvā samucita-mūlyena mauktikāny ānayatu |
GR14muktacau:197: sampraty asmābhir upālabdhasya tasya samīpam aham ekākinī gantum aśaktāsmi |
GR14muktacau:199: iti sarvāsām anumatyā bahu-suvarṇāni gṛhītvā mauktika-vāṭikā-samīpaṃ te ājagmatuḥ |
GR14muktacau:201: tad-vāṭikādhikāriṇaṃ subalaṃ mayā saha niviṣṭam abrūtām |
GR14muktacau:202: he subala śrutam asmābhir bhavadbhir navya-muktāni vikrīyante |
GR14muktacau:206: tadānīm anekadhā prārthyamānaṃ naikam api mauktikam asmabhyaṃ dattam |
GR14muktacau:210: tathāpi bhavatīnāṃ gṛha-sarvasvenāpi paṇīkṛtena nikhila-mauktika-vṛndādapakṛṣṭam ekam api mauktikaṃ sarvathā na dātavyam |
GR14muktacau:213: na bhavet tadāsya kadarthanoktim īdṛśīṃ kā nāma saheta |
GR14muktacau:215: haṭṭa-prasārita-bahuratnā madhurā tāvad dūre tad adya bhoḥ subala svayam eva bhavatā madhyasthena bhūyatām |
GR14muktacau:219: bhavatu nāma svabhāva-komalena mayā tu bhavatībhir iva kāṭhinyaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate |
GR14muktacau:226: tataś candramukhī kiñcid vihasya kāñcanalatām ālokitavatī |
GR14muktacau:228: sakhe subala svayam eva madhyasthena bhūtvā samādhāya samīcīna-yaśo-bhāras tāvad aṅgīkriyatāṃ bhavatā |
GR14muktacau:230: vayasya rahasyatayā bahu-mūlyatvaṃ kiyat kāñcanalatayā prakaṭīkriyate |
GR14muktacau:231: ātmano'bhīṣṭa-mūlyaṃ svayam eva sphuṭaṃ nigadya na kathaṃ
GR14muktacau:235: muktāphalāni grahītuṃ kāñcanalataiva vicāryānargha-mūlyatvena parikalpya rādhādibhiḥ prahitya mama dattāstīti |
GR14muktacau:238: tasmād ekayaiva kāñcanalatayā katham etāsāṃ mūlya-paryāptiḥ |
GR14muktacau:241: cintāmaṇayo'pi santīti candramukhī vakṣati tathāpi na |
GR14muktacau:245: tac chrutvā bhrū-bhaṅgena mām avalokayantī kāñcanalatā saroṣam āha -
GR14muktacau:246: nirbuddhike candramukhi! tadaiva mayoktaṃ tasya dhṛṣṭasya savidhe mayā na gantavyam |
GR14muktacau:248: tvaṃ muktāphalāny ādāya samāgaccha aham itaś calitāsmi |
GR14muktacau:249: candramukhī āha - kāñcanalate! satyaṃ kathayasi tat katham ekākinyā mayā
GR14muktacau:252: ekayoga-nirdiṣṭānāṃ saha vā pravṛttiḥ saha vā nivṛttir iti mayāpi gantavyam |
GR14muktacau:253: ity ubhe eva gamanodyate dṛṣṭvā mayoktam - subala! tadaiva mayoktaṃ yad etābhyāṃ mūlya-nirṇayo na bhaviṣyati |
GR14muktacau:254: tac chrutvā tayoḥ savidham āgatya subalenoktam - sakhi candramukhi!
GR14muktacau:257: tena priya-sakhī rādhā lalitādibhiḥ sahāgatya samakṣam eva samucita-mūlyaṃ pradāya svepsita-muktāphalāni gṛhṇātu |
GR14muktacau:258: tatra mayā madhyasthena bhūtvā sācivyaṃ karaṇīyam |
GR14muktacau:259: iti niśamya candramukhī-kāñcanalate tāsāṃ savidhe gatvā sa-roṣam iva sarvaṃ vṛttaṃ kathayāṃcakratuḥ
GR14muktacau:260: tataś ca rādhā lalitādibhiḥ saha mauktika-bāṭī-prāntam āsādya
GR14muktacau:261: candramukhī-dvārā subalam ākārya tam āha - priya-vayasya subala |
GR14muktacau:263: ataḥ svayam eva tathā vidhīyatāṃ yathāsmābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:265: tac chrutvā subalena mahyaṃ nivedya mad-vacanena mat-sannidhau tā lalitādayaḥ samānītāḥ
GR14muktacau:267: mad-upadrāvaka-sva-priya-vayasyāya sarvathā na prakāśanīyam iti subalam ābhāṣya man-nikaṭa-stha-kadamba-kuñjāntar nikhila-vṛttāntaṃ niśamayantī nigūḍham āsthitā |
GR14muktacau:268: tato mayā tāḥ sarvā nibhālya rādhā kathaṃ na dṛśyate ity ukte tuṅgavidyayoktam -
GR14muktacau:269: gokula-yuva-rāja! sā khalu sa-praṇayaṃ āryayā jaṭilayā kasyacid
GR14muktacau:273: mayoktam - tuṅgavidye! muktā-grahaṇecchā tasyā na vidyate iti dṛśyate |
GR14muktacau:276: tadā mayoktaṃ - viśākhaiva rādhā, rādhaiva viśākhā |
GR14muktacau:279: bhavatu tatra samāgraho nāsti, kintu yā khalu svayam āgatya na
GR14muktacau:281: mauktikāni ca sādhāraṇāny eva dīyantām iti me sarveṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ sudṛḍho nirṇayaḥ |
GR14muktacau:282: tad anu subalaṃ prati mayoktaṃ - sakhe subala! avacita
GR14muktacau:284: ānīya purataḥ prasārya vicitya sarva-kaniṣṭhāny eva mauktikāni pūrvakṛtaṃ
GR14muktacau:285: tat-kārpaṇyam apy avigaṇayya prathamaṃ tat-kṛte viśākhāyāṃ samarpya tat-sakāśāc
GR14muktacau:287: yadi vā prastutaṃ dātuṃ na śaknoti tatas
GR14muktacau:289: tāvat puṣpa-pravāla-corikā gopa-kanyakā yatra rakṣyante tatraivārān
GR14muktacau:294: tadā mayoktaṃ - vayasya! mayāpy etad jñāyata eva |
GR14muktacau:297: para-rāmā-sparśo lajjā-tyāgaś cāsmad-vidhānāṃ svapne'py atīvāyogyas tathāpi -
GR14muktacau:298: sva-kāryam uddharet prājñaḥ kurvann api vigarhitaḥ |
GR14muktacau:300: āhāre vyavahāre ca lajjām api parityajet |
GR14muktacau:301: iti saṃhitā-vacana-balād aham eva prahariko bhavan sarvām eva rātriṃ jāgran nirantaraṃ nivatsyāmi |
GR14muktacau:302: iti niśamya subalaḥ sa-smitam āha - puruṣottama! priya-sakhyā viśākhayā etāvati mahā-saṅkaṭe kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthātavyam ?
GR14muktacau:303: tato mayoktaṃ - yad artham iyaṃ rakṣyate sā yāvat niḥśeṣaṃ mūlya-dravyaṃ
GR14muktacau:305: kiṃ vā kiyad-dravyaṃ gṛhītvā svayam evāgatya dhruvam asyāḥ snehād ittham atra sthitvā avaśiṣṭa-dravyānayanārtham enāṃ prasthāpayati |
GR14muktacau:307: iti śrutvā madhumaṅgalaḥ prāha - sakhe! etad-goṣṭhīnām adhīśā sā sarvābhyo'pi
GR14muktacau:308: sarva-karmaṇi vicakṣaṇā viśeṣataḥ palāyane gavya-ghaṭṭyāṃ dānādiṣu sarvair asmābhi punaḥ punaḥ prayakṣīkṛtāsti |
GR14muktacau:309: tvaṃ tv aniśaam udghūrṇase tena me mahatī cintā jñāyate |
GR14muktacau:310: tataḥ smitam apavāryāham avadaṃ - sakhe! alam anayā cintayā |
GR14muktacau:318: yathā sukhena jāgaryām eva catvāro rajani-yāmā drutam eva viramanti |
GR14muktacau:320: mad-uro-nāma-ghanāndhakāra-viṣama-kārāgārāntas tāṃ praviśya tat-pārśva-yugalaṃ kaṭhora-bhuja-gārutmatārgalābhyāṃ dṛḍhaṃ saṃruddhya sukhena nirātaṅkaḥ svapna-vilāsaṃ vitariṣyāmi |
GR14muktacau:322: rādhā tūdgrīvikayā māṃ viśākhāṃ sarvāś ca sakhīr avalokayantī āha - candrāvalī-keli-kuraṅga! tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti anuccair māṃ tarjayantī susmitāsīt |
GR14muktacau:323: viśākhā tu kuṭila-dṛṣṭyā mām avalokayantī āha - vraja-dhūrta-dhṛṣṭa! apehai apehīti vadantī sakhī-madhye līnā babhūva |
GR14muktacau:324: tataḥ sarvābhiḥ subalaṃ praty uktaṃ - subala! vidūṣakatāṃ tyaja |
GR14muktacau:325: yadi bhavatāṃ vikrayecchā vartate, tarhi muktāḥ pradarśya samucita-mūlyena pradīyantām |
GR14muktacau:328: iti niśamya subalena sampuṭānudghāṭya tābhyāṃ mauktikāni pradarśya māṃ praty uktaṃ -- priya-vayasya! imāni mauktikāny amūlyāni ābhir gṛha-paty-ādikaṃ
GR14muktacau:329: samasta-godhanāni ca vikrīyāpi ekasyāpi mūlyaṃ dātum aśakyam |
GR14muktacau:330: etāḥ khalu bhavat-snigdhāḥ sarvān upekṣya tvāṃ jānanti |
GR14muktacau:333: api vismṛtya māṃ ca tva-anugatam avekṣya yat-kiñcin-mūlyaṃ gṛhītvā
GR14muktacau:335: dattavad āsām abhīpsita-mauktikāni dātum ājñā kriyatām |
GR14muktacau:341: tad yat kiñcid alpam eva mayā mṛgyate tad dāpayitvaiva dīyantām |
GR14muktacau:342: kiṃ ca utkocaṃ gṛhītvā bāraṃ bāraṃ mama
GR14muktacau:343: ghaṭṭī-dāna-dravyāṇi bhavatā vināśitāni sanītit mama kenāpi kathitam asti tasmān mūlya-dravyaṃ samakṣam eva mayaivābhyo grahītavyam |
GR14muktacau:346: svīya-svīyābhīpsita-mauktikāni vicitya pṛthak pṛthak kuṭī-kṛtāni dṛṣṭvā bhavatāpi svābhīpsita-mūlyaṃ kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:347: tato'ham abruvam - bhadraṃ darśayantu sva-svābhīpsita-mauktikāni mūlyaṃ kathyate mayā |
GR14muktacau:348: subalaḥ prāha - priya-vayasya! etāḥ vinayena yan nivedayanti tat kṛpayāvadhārya bhavate yadi rocate tadā vidhīyatām |
GR14muktacau:350: kathyatāṃ kiṃ nivedayanti yuktaṃ cet kartavyam |
GR14muktacau:351: subalaḥ prāha - evaṃ nivedayanti, madhu-purī tāvad dūre samagra-mūlya-dravyāṇāṃ ca samācayanaṃ dina-dvaya-madhya eva sampadyate |
GR14muktacau:352: gurukulaṃ tu mauktikālaṅkārādy-adarśanāt kṣaṇe kṣaṇe khidyamānaṃ bāḍham ākrośati |
GR14muktacau:353: ato'tisnigdhān bhavad-vidhān avagatya lajjām api parihāya
GR14muktacau:354: nirjana-vanāntaram āgatānām asmākam ṛṇenaiva mauktikāni dāpayitvā drutam
GR14muktacau:356: mūlya-dravyāṇy asmābhir bhavatām abhīpsita-vṛddhi-sahitāni dina-dvayābhyantare pariśodhya praheyāṇi yady
GR14muktacau:358: bhavad-vayasyasya pratītir na jāyate tadā tvam evāsmākaṃ pratibhūr bhaveti |
GR14muktacau:359: tasmāt parama-pratīti-pātrābhyaḥ santata-satyavādinībhya etābhyaḥ pratītiṃ kṛtvā datteṣu mauktikeṣu mūlya-dravyam abhīpsita-vṛddhiś cācirāl lapsyate |
GR14muktacau:362: āsāṃ vyavahṛtiḥ kiñcin mātrāpi tvayā na jñāyate |
GR14muktacau:366: praviśya dravyam adattvā yadi khelyantyas tiṣṭheyus tarhi tvayā kiṃ kartavyam |
GR14muktacau:369: yadi vā kuryus tadojjvala-vanāntārjuna-kokilādibhiḥ saha tatra gatvā svayam ābhiḥ svīkṛtam
GR14muktacau:371: etāsāṃ bhartṛṣu saṃśrāvya tat-prāpty-arthaṃ tebhyas tathā bhayaṃ
GR14muktacau:373: yathā ta eva drutam amūs tvat-samīpaṃ prasthāpya tad dāpayiṣyanti |
GR14muktacau:374: tan niśamya madhumaṅgalena sa-krodham uktaṃ - re subala! tvaṃ nāmnaiva subalaḥ pumāṃś cāsi
GR14muktacau:376: yataḥ sāmpratam apy āsām abalānāṃ phutkāraṃ kṣudrād atikṣudratareṣu tad-bhartṛṣu kartuṃ yad
GR14muktacau:378: tasmāt tvam evātropaviśya mayaiva vijayādidhāṭīṃ pragṛhya balād āsāṃ bhartṛ-sahita-go-mahiṣyādikaṃ
GR14muktacau:380: tadā tā eva svayam āgatya sva-sva-dravyaṃ sutarāṃ dattvā svaṃ svaṃ patiṃ godhanādikaṃ ca mocayiṣyanti |
GR14muktacau:382: madhumaṅgala! katham evaṃ tvayā mantryate ? vraja-vāsino bhilla-pulindādyā
GR14muktacau:384: ete tu sa-gotrāḥ sahodarā mad-abhinnā eva
GR14muktacau:387: tathāpi na priya-janaiḥ samam ādāna-pradāna-prayogeṇa rasa-rakṣā na jāyata eva |
GR14muktacau:389: naivādānaṃ pradānaṃ hi mitraiḥ saha vitanyate |
GR14muktacau:390: kṛte prītyā bhavel lopaḥ kalahas tad-anantaram || iti |
GR14muktacau:391: tataḥ prastutam eva mūlyaṃ dattvā mauktikāni nayantu |
GR14muktacau:392: tac chrutvā sa-krodham iva subalaṃ nibhālya - aye! kauṭilya-pāraṅgata
GR14muktacau:394: sarvair eva militvā viḍambayitum eva vayam atrānītā bhavatā |
GR14muktacau:396: vayaṃ calitāḥ sma ity uktvā calantīnāṃ tāsāṃ savidham āsādya sauhārdam abhivyañjayan subalo lalitāṃ nīcaiḥ prāha - sakhi lalite! ādāna-pradāna-vyavahārasya sneha-bhaṅga-kāritvāt
GR14muktacau:398: tad-bhayenaiva priya-vayasyena mūlya-nirṇayaṃ prastuta-vitta-lābhaṃ ca vinā sarvathaiva mauktikāni na deyānīit sarva-prakāreṇāvadhāritam |
GR14muktacau:399: tasmāt samāgatya prathamaṃ tāvan mūlyam eva nirṇīyatām |
GR14muktacau:400_0: tad-dānopāyaḥ paścāc cintanīyaḥ ity anunayena tāḥ parāvṛtya mat-samīpam ānīya māṃ praty uvāca - vayasya! narma hitvā mūlyam
GR14muktacau:400_1: eva tāvat kathyatām |.tato'ham -- sakhe subala! prathamaṃ tāvat kasya mauktikānāṃ mūlyaṃ kathanīyam ?
GR14muktacau:401: subalaḥ prāha - etāsāṃ madhye lalitaiva mukhyā tad etad
GR14muktacau:404: tato'haṃ kiñcid vihasya - etad-vāhinīnāṃ pravīṇayā lalitayā samare
GR14muktacau:405: pauruṣeṇa yadi mādṛśaḥ puruṣa-siṃhaḥ sakṛd api kuṇṭhitāstrīkartuṃ śakyate |
GR14muktacau:407: kiṃ vā santatam amuktāstrī bhūtvā etaṃ puaruṣam evānukīrtayann imām evānucariṣyāmīti idam eva yat kiñcin mūlyaṃ dattvā gṛhṇātu |
GR14muktacau:410: vāma-kara-kamala-kaniṣṭhāṅguli-varāṭaka-śikharopari bhramara iva govardhana-girir yena vyadhāyi tenoccaṇḍena bhavatā samam abaleyaṃ
GR14muktacau:412: madhumaṅgalaḥ prāha - subala! taṃ kathaṃ pūrvam asya paugaṇḍa-kṛtaṃ darpam atiślāghase ? yad adhunā tāruṇyāmṛta-sekena sa
GR14muktacau:415: madhumaṅgalaḥ - yad anena pūrvārīṇāṃ sakalānāṃ pūrvaṃ yādṛśa-vaikalyaṃ
GR14muktacau:416: kāritam āsīt, sāmpratam etad durgamaṃ tad-dhṛdayaṅgamāna-tanu-parvatān
GR14muktacau:417: abhilīlayaiva kena ca nakharāstreṇaiva khaṇḍa-khaṇḍīkṛtya mahāmārādibhis
GR14muktacau:419: tato'haṃ vihasya - subala! satyam anyatra mayā tādṛśenaiva bhūyate |
GR14muktacau:420: na tv etasyāḥ purataḥ yasmāt tato'pi pravara-vigrahe vividha-vaicitrī-pravīṇayānayā
GR14muktacau:421: bāraṃ bāraṃ bhrū-dhanuṣ-ṭaṅkāreṇaiva huṅkāreṇa helayā stabdhīkṛto'smi |
GR14muktacau:423: ity ākarṇanena smera-mukhīḥ sakhīr avalokya svānandottha-vikārān avagūhya sakrodham iva lalitayoktaṃ - aye subala vidūṣaka! madhumaṅgala-sahacarasya
GR14muktacau:424: gokula-bhaṇḍasya bhaṇḍatā-devyā satyaṃ tvam apy āviṣṭo'si |
GR14muktacau:425: yad asmān etat-samakṣaṃ samānāyya viḍambana-samudre saṃpātayan kautukaṃ paśyann
GR14muktacau:426_0: asaīti nigadya kuṭila-dṛṣṭyā mām ākṣipantīm āgacchata bhoḥ saralāḥ! āgacchatety uktvā sarvābhiḥ saha gacchantīṃ tad avasara
GR14muktacau:426_1: eva tatrāgatā bhagavatyāḥ paurṇamāsyā antevāsinī nāndīmukhī tad-gamana-vārtām akhilāṃ sarvābhyaḥ samavadhārya vyājahāra -
GR14muktacau:428: parihāsa-vāṅ-mātreṇaiva sva-kāryam upekṣya katham apayānty asi ? kṣaṇaṃ mayā saha nirvṛtya
GR14muktacau:429: apamānaṃ puraskṛtya mānaṃ kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhataḥ |
GR14muktacau:430: sva-kāryam uddharet prājñaḥ kārya-dhvaṃso hi mūrkhatā ||
GR14muktacau:431: ity ādi-nyāyena parihāsa-viḍambanāni soḍhvā sthairyam ālambya sva-kāryam
GR14muktacau:433: kiṃ ca mayā śapathaṃ kṛtvā vyāhriyate |
GR14muktacau:434: asya narmabhir eva lagnakair iva mauktikāni dāpayitavyāni |
GR14muktacau:439: śrutvā yat kṛte bhadraṃ syāt tad eva vyavahartavyam iti balād iva tāṃ haste gṛhītvā sarvābhiḥ saha muktākuṭa-nikaṭam ānīya māṃ pratyuktavatī gokula-yuvarāja!
GR14muktacau:440: tatra-bhavatyā bhagavatyā śubhāśīḥ śata-pūrvakaṃ bhavantaṃ prati kiñcit
GR14muktacau:442: tato'haṃ -- nāndīmukhi! kuśalam āste tatra-bhavatī bhagavatī ? tat kathyatāṃ kim
GR14muktacau:445: nāndīmukhī -- imā vatsā rādhādayo vraja-kumārikā asmākam atīva sneha-pātrāṇi āyuṣmati bhavaty api santataṃ paramānuraktāḥ |
GR14muktacau:446: tad asmān vīkṣya atyāgrahaṃ vimucya āsāṃ dātuṃ śakyamāna-mūlyam ādāya maāṣṭa-nidhi-pater
GR14muktacau:447_0: vrajendrasya kumāreṇa bhavatā etad abhīṣṭa-mauktikāni dattvā vayaṃ santoṣaṇīyā iti bhagavatyāḥ sandeśam imam avakalayya narmāṇi
GR14muktacau:447_1: parityajya muktāphala-dānenaitāḥ santoṣya gṛhāya prasthāpayituṃ mahānubhāvāḥ
GR14muktacau:451_0: śirasi nidhāya samagrame eva parityajya lalitā-mauktikānāṃ yaḥ kaścana mūlyābhāso'nayā saha nirṇīto'sti tam asyā mukhato
GR14muktacau:451_1: niśamya tato yat tvayā tyājyate tad api mayā tyājyam ity ākarṇya sakampādharaṃ bhruvaṃ kuṭilayantīṃ lalitāṃ sarvāś ca smita-mukhīr
GR14muktacau:452: avalokayantī nāndīmukhī smita-pūrvakam evāha - vraja-yuva-rāja! sa imābhyaḥ śruto'sti, kintu tādṛṅ narma parihāya amat-samakṣam anyāsāṃ sarvāsām eva
GR14muktacau:454: tato mayoktaṃ - nāndīmukhi! āsāṃ sarvato jyāyasī jyeṣṭhā tad asyā
GR14muktacau:455: mauktika-mūlyam anayā saha vicārya tvayaiva kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:457: tat svayam eva bhavatā tat kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:458: tato'haṃ - niśāpater mama hṛdayākāśa-vīthyām uditāyāṃ rādhāyām udayantyām
GR14muktacau:459: anurādhāyāṃ sva-maryādām unmucya tayor madhye rāgeṇodayantī jyeṣṭhā man-mukha-candraṃ tābhyāṃ saha vā pṛthag vā manāg api sva-mukhena
GR14muktacau:461: tatas tan niśamya nikuñjāntaritāyāṃ rādhāyāṃ lalitā-viśākhā-jyeṣṭhāsu ca tisṛṣu bhrū-bhaṅgena krodham abhinayantīṣu mayoktaṃ - nāndīmukhi!
GR14muktacau:462: sva-sva-mahā-lābha-karam api bhāṣitam avadhārya katham etāḥ krudhyanti ?
GR14muktacau:463: nāndīmukhī - sundara! gokula-śyāma-niśāpater anya-parigṛhītānāṃ satīnām asmākam etat-para-puruṣasya satīnām asmākam etat para-puruṣasya
GR14muktacau:464: mukha-candra-cumbana-karaṇaṃ dūre tāvad āstāṃ sparśo'pi mahā-pāpāyaiveti
GR14muktacau:466: ityādi vinoda-līlām ākarṇya satyabhāmā kṛṣṇam āha - nātha! tārā-gaṇane
GR14muktacau:467: rādhāyā viśākheti-prasiddham api nāma hitvā sākūtam anurādheti nāma
GR14muktacau:468: prayuñjatas tan-narmālāpa-bhaṅgīṃ svasmin svasminn evāvadhārayantyos tayor
GR14muktacau:472: satyabhāmā - yādavendra! etad apūrva-līlā-kathā-śravaṇena mama manasi tṛptir alaṃ vṛttir nāsti tat kathaya kathaya |
GR14muktacau:473_0: kṛṣṇaḥ - tato'haṃ smita-śavalita-campakalatā-vadana-candram ālokayaṃs tad gṛhīta-muktā-kūṭaṃ hastena cālayann idam avadaṃ
GR14muktacau:473_1: - nāndīmukhi! iyaṃ te priya-sakhī campakalatā kasmād api siddhāt prāpta-siddhir iti mayā bahu-dinam
GR14muktacau:476: mayoktaṃ - yata iyaṃ campakavallī sthāvarā madhye bṛhat-phala-dvaya-bhārānatāpi
GR14muktacau:484: subalaḥ - priya-sakhe! caṅkramaṇādinā'syāḥ siddhiḥ sarvair anubhūyata eva
GR14muktacau:485: | tava tu kenāpi kadāpi kutrāpi sā naiva dṛṣṭāsti |
GR14muktacau:486: tasmād duṣkare'smin karmaṇi sahasaiva pravṛttena bhavatā aydi niṣpādayitum aśakyaṃ syāt tarhi vayam ābhir upahasiṣyāmahe |
GR14muktacau:488: tato'haṃ - subala! mama siddhiṃ paśyann api na paśyasi ? mayā kiṃ kartavyam ?
GR14muktacau:490: kadā kutra kā siddhis tvayā niṣpāditāsti |
GR14muktacau:493: tato mayoktaṃ - deva-yātrāyām ambikā-vane śaraṇāgatatvena tāta-pādayoḥ
GR14muktacau:500: bāraṃ bāraṃ mahādāvānalo'py amṛtīkṛtya sukhenaiva sphuṭam apāyi |
GR14muktacau:501: evam ādayo bahavaḥ siddhi-prabhāvā gokule kena nānubhūtāḥ santi ? tad ativistareṇālam |
GR14muktacau:502: iti niśamya īṣat-smayamānā lalitā prāha - nāndīmukhi! eṣa te durlalito
GR14muktacau:510: tato'haṃ kiñcid vihasya - lalite! tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ sarva-bhujo
GR14muktacau:511: yathā ity asya padyasyārtham abuddhaiva tvyedam ucyate |
GR14muktacau:518: avirata-madhura-rasopabhoga-mādhuryeṇa mamāpi siddhir nirantaram ujjvalā bhavantī parama-vṛddhim evādhikatarām avāpa |
GR14muktacau:520: siddhiś cen na vṛddhim āyāti tarhi muktaḥ kathaṃ bhūmau prārohanti ? prārūḍhāś ca kathaṃ sarvataḥ prasāriṇyā vallikā bhavantyaḥ pracurataraṃ phullanti phalanti ca ?
GR14muktacau:521: lalitā vihasya - ārya madhumaṅgala! tat kiṃ bhavat-priya-vayasyasya
GR14muktacau:525: rādhā svagataṃ - lalite! etat kāminī-saṅgasya cety ucyatām iti rādhayoktaṃ viśākhāpy anubhāṣitavatī
GR14muktacau:526: tato'haṃ - tat katham atraiva bhavatībhir upta-muktā hiṃsrā jātāḥ ?
GR14muktacau:527: lalitā - bho vidagdha-śiromaṇe! muktāḥ kiṃ hiṃsrā bhavanti ?
GR14muktacau:530: rādhā svagataṃ - lalite! kṣetrasyāsya guṇād apy ucyatām ity etad viśākhāpy uktavatī |
GR14muktacau:531: nāndīmukhī - lalite! satyam eva kathayati viśākhā |
GR14muktacau:535: -mahā-kṣetre'smin vṛndāvane dhruvam āgantukā ye kecana jantavo bhaktā eva bhavanti kathaṃ nu muktā bhavantu |
GR14muktacau:540: viśākhā - ārūḍha-yogo'pi nipātyate'dhaḥ-saṅgena yogī kim utālpa-siddhir
GR14muktacau:541: iti nyāyenāsya kāye manasi gotre ca śyāmalatarasya sa-cchidra-vaṃśī-rasikasya
GR14muktacau:542: kṣaṇa-mātra-saṅgena muktā api bhūmau garbha-vāsena jananam āsādya ca-cchidrībhūya saṃsāra-guṇa-baddhā babhūvuḥ |
GR14muktacau:543: tato'haṃ - viśākhe! nikhilam eva satyaṃ kathayasi |
GR14muktacau:547: kaṭhora-tapasyākulam ācarya gokula-vane'smin pravara-gopa-gṛheṣu janim aṅgīkṛtya vraja-vilāsinyo bhūtvā susāra-vaidagdhyādi-guṇair āvṛtya etā iva
GR14muktacau:552: paśu-pakṣi-bhūruhādayo bhūtvā mām ānandayantaḥ paramānandam āsvādayanto nandayanti |
GR14muktacau:554: lalitā kiñcid vihasya - mahā-siddhaś ced bhūmi-bheda-guṇaṃ vinā tava siddheḥ prabhāvān muktā jāyante tarhi parama-siddho'pi bhavān
GR14muktacau:557: tato'haṃ - mūrkhe lalitike! yauvana-dhana-garvitābhir bhavatībhir yathā sva-dharmaṃ parityajya itas tataś cañcalyate tathā svadharma-pariniṣṭha-vaiśya
GR14muktacau:558_0: śiromaṇi-śrī-vraja-rājasya eka-putreṇa mayāpi svadharmaṃ parityajya kim ucchṛṅkhalena bhavitavyam ? yataḥ kṛṣi-vāṇijya-go-rakṣā-kuśīdaṃ
GR14muktacau:558_1: tūryam ucyate iti vaiśyānām asmākaṃ catasro vṛttayo bhavanti |
GR14muktacau:561: sarva-siddher vṛddhis tac-catuṣṭayam ācarato mama punaḥ siddhiḥ
GR14muktacau:564: kṛṣi-vāṇijya-gorakṣā-tisro vṛttayaḥ spaṣṭam anubhūyanta eva vṛddhi-jīvikā
GR14muktacau:566: tato'haṃ - nāndīmukhi! sāpy asmābhiḥ kriyamāṇāpi tvayā kiṃ na jñāyate ?
GR14muktacau:567: sāmpratam api muktātyantābhāva-saṅkṣobhinībhir etābhiḥ saha saṃkāmita-svadharmaṃ muktāpāra-vyāpāra-vṛddhi-vṛttiṃ vidhātum ārabdhavān asmi |
GR14muktacau:568: viśākhā kiñcid vihasya - subala! yatra yo rajyati, sa khalu vinindyam api tad eva
GR14muktacau:570: atas tāvat suṣṭhu adharmasyāpi śobhanatvena varṇanam asya tva-priya-sakhasya nāyogyam |
GR14muktacau:571: subalo vihasya - nāndīmukhi! na kevalam asau dhanasya vṛddhiṃ labhate,
GR14muktacau:572: kintv anyeṣāṃ padārthānām api kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛddhiṃ labhamāno'sti ||
GR14muktacau:577: madhumaṅgalaḥ - subala! itara-padārthānāṃ vṛddhiṃ kiṃ tvayā vismṛtā ?
GR14muktacau:582: lalitā - ārya! anyataraika-vastunaḥ kathaṃ vṛddhiṃ saṅgopitavān asi |

GR14muktacau:597: vṛddhi-vārtā tu dūre vartatām iti suṣṭhu vijñāyāhaṃ mitreṇa hitam āśāṃsanīyam iti vijñāpayann asmi |
GR14muktacau:599: tato'haṃ daśanai rasanāṃ sandaśya - sakhe! imā gāndharvādayaḥ kulāṅganāḥ

GR14muktacau:600_1: atīva santoṣya gāndharvayā mat-sakāśāt prātar gṛhīta-kamal-rāga-rekhikā-yugalena nija-vakṣoruhaṃ
GR14muktacau:601: paribhūṣya mad-urasi tad eva caturguṇīkṛtya sāyam eva vitīrṇam |

GR14muktacau:605: man-madhurādharāmṛtam ādāya sva-sarva-bhūtaṃ tad eva prātar bahu-guṇīkṛtya
GR14muktacau:608: sva-svābhīṣṭa-padārtham āgraheṇābhigṛhya kāścid dviguṇīkṛtya kāścit triguṇīkṛtya pradāya mām atīva santoṣitavatyaḥ |
GR14muktacau:613: nija-vakṣaḥ-sthit-nistala-madhura-phala-yugalasya trirāropaṇam urīkṛtya mat-kara-mardana-phala-dvayaṃ gṛhītvā sakṛd eva tad-arpitaṃ avaiśiṣṭaṃ
GR14muktacau:616: tulasī nāmnī dviguṇīkṛtya dātum uktvā mad-eka-parirambha-stavakaṃ samādāya sāmpratam idānīṃ deyaṃ tadānīṃ deyam iti kālaṃ kṣapayantī mūlam api na
GR14muktacau:618: madhumaṅgalaḥ - ayi raṅgaṇavallī-tulasyau! yuvayoḥ sakāśād albhyamānātma-divya-dravyo'pi
GR14muktacau:622: ācarantībhyāṃ bhavatībhyāṃ kṛtaghnatvāt loka-dharmato bhayaṃ na kriyate |
GR14muktacau:623: tad ākarṇya cāru hasantī lalitā prāha - sakhyus tavārya madhumaṅgala!
GR14muktacau:624: bhāṣitaṃ tat pīyūṣataḥ priyataraṃ nahi kasya goṣṭhe pratyakṣaraṃ pratipadaṃ
GR14muktacau:628: sādhu lalite! sādhu varṇitam iti sarvās tās tām āliṅgatavatyaḥ |
GR14muktacau:630: nāndīmukhī - mohana! katham apratītiḥ kriyate ? lalitā-prema-pātrīyaṃ
GR14muktacau:631: raṅgaṇa-mālikā, dvitīyā ca viśākhā-priya-śiṣyā tad etābhyām eva te prbodhya tad
GR14muktacau:633: yathā tābhyāṃ saha bhavataḥ śuddha-bhāvena punaḥ punar eṣa vyavahāro nirvahati |
GR14muktacau:634: yadi vā dāpayituṃ na śakyate tadā
GR14muktacau:637: ete api yadi te jhaṭiti dātuṃ nāṅgīkurutas tarhi kenāpi bhavān anuyoktuṃ na śakyate |
GR14muktacau:638: bhavatā tv anaṅga-mañjarī-sahodarāgrataḥ kriyamāṇa eva phutkārārambhe tābhyām eva sādhvasena svīkṛta-vṛddhi-sahitaṃ tad drutaṃ sutarāṃ vitariṣyate |
GR14muktacau:639: tataḥ sarvāsu nāndīmukhīṃ māṃ ca sa-bhrū-kuṭi-kauṭilyam īkṣamāṇāsu kiñcid upasṛtya tuṅgavidyā sāntaḥ-smitam āha - bho bhoḥ sakhyaḥ! apūrvaikā vārtā śrūyatām |
GR14muktacau:642: lalitā - paramparayā śruto'sti bhadreṇa na jñāyate |
GR14muktacau:644: sandhi-catuṣṭayākhyāta-kṛd-vṛttaya iti vyākhyātāś catasro vṛttayo yāḥ kṛtāḥ santi tāḥ kiṃ bhavatībhir dṛṣṭa-caryo bhavanti ?
GR14muktacau:645: viśākhā -- viṣṇu viṣṇu tad-vṛtti-darśanaṃ tāvad-dūre'stu sa eva kadāpi na

GR14muktacau:648: tuṅgavidyā - sakhīsthalyā eka-mahā-padmāpsarasā tad-vṛtti-pāī̀ohārthaṃ taṃ mṛgayituṃ sāya atrāgatam āsīt |
GR14muktacau:651: ity ākarṇya sarvāḥ smitaṃ kurvanti sma |
GR14muktacau:656: tathādāna-pradāna-pañjikā ca prapañcitā anukrameṇa nāmnāntareṇa ca prapañcitaitat-pañjikā-catuṣṭayaṃ bhavatībhiḥ śrutam astīti manye |
GR14muktacau:657: lalitā - atha kiṃ so'pi suṣṭhu anubhūyamāno'sti |
GR14muktacau:660: kuhaka-bhaṭṭena tad-vrtti-catuṣṭayasya ṭīkā yugapat-kartum ārabdhāḥ santi |
GR14muktacau:661: campakalatā - tuṅgavidye! tvaṃ sarva-vidyā-viśāradāsi tad eṣāṃ catūrṇāṃ
GR14muktacau:663: viśākhā - ācārya-bhaṭṭayor arthaḥ spaṣṭa eva tan-miśra-paṇḍitayoḥ sa tāvan nirucyatām |
GR14muktacau:664: tuṅgavidyā vihasya - doṣo'py asti guṇo'py asti tena miśrena miśreta iti miśraḥ |
GR14muktacau:665: nāndīmukhī - kataro vā doṣaḥ kataro vā gunaḥ ?
GR14muktacau:666: tuṅgavidyā - vaidagdhyāvaidagdhayor avicāreṇaiva yatra kutrāpi sarvatra pravṛttir iti doṣaḥ
GR14muktacau:667: sāralyādhikyena uttamānuttamāvicāreṇaiva vaiṣamyaṃ vinā sarvatra samatayā pravṛttir iti mahān guṇaḥ |
GR14muktacau:668: lalitā smitvā - tad asyaitan-miśratā padavī samucitaiva |
GR14muktacau:672: ayaṃ tu buddhi-gauraveṇa pūrva-parayoḥ para-vidhir balavān iti vicārya parā
GR14muktacau:674: yā sā paṇḍā tām evottaramtveāśritas tad-yuktatvāt paṇḍita iti |
GR14muktacau:675: citrā - sakhi tuṅgavidye! sandhyādi-catuṣṭayasyāpy arthaḥ prakāśya kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:676: tuṅgavidyā - citre! asmad-goṣṭhyāṃ tat-prapañcena lalitaiva dakṣā tat
GR14muktacau:678: lalitā - citre! etat-prasaṅga-leśo'pi mayā kadāpi na śruto'pi tad
GR14muktacau:680: citrā - tuṅgavidye! mac-chirasā śāpitāsi tvayaiva vyākhyāyatām |
GR14muktacau:681: tato'tilajjayā svayam asaṃkathya rādhikātiprīti-pātrīṃ manāg apy anucyamānāṃ
GR14muktacau:683_0: cakṣuḥ-kūṇanena sa-smitam ālokayantyāṃ tuṅgavidyāyāṃ, tuṅganarmā kiñcit sannidhāya sa-smita-man-mukham avalokayantī nijagāda
GR14muktacau:683_1: - citre! sa tāvad artho'smābhir na jñāyate kintu tayāpsarasā punaḥ punar āgatya sa-vinayaṃ

GR14muktacau:687: prathamaṃ śṛṇu dūtī-dvārā vā kṛtābhiyogena yūnor milanaṃ sandhiḥ |

GR14muktacau:705: ca prakaṭam anigadya bhaṅgyā nāma-dheyāntareṇa ca yat kiñcit nigūhitaṃ tad bhavad-vidha-rasika-snigdha-vidagdha-janair
GR14muktacau:707: campakalatā kiñcid vihasya - tuṅgavidye! etad-bhaṭṭa-pādānāṃ tvāv eva bhujau tatrāpy atīva sukumārau tat katham ekadaiva ṭīkā-catuṣṭayaṃ lekhituṃ śaknotu |
GR14muktacau:708: tuṅgavidyā -- mugdhe! nijendra-jāla-balenāyaṃ bhuja-catuṣṭayam api prāduṣkartuṃ śaknoti |

GR14muktacau:714_1: tāṃ jetuṃ nija-kuhaka-pāṇḍityena samprati vṛddhi-vṛttim ācaratā pada-dvayasya

GR14muktacau:749: tato'haṃ citrāṃ mauktikāni haste cālayann uktavān - citre! samakṣam āgatya mauktika-mūlyaṃ śṛṇu śṛṅgāra-karma-vicakṣaṇāyās tava mūrti-mañjuṣikāyāṃ

GR14muktacau:756: tat-tat-sādhana-karma-karmaṭhābhis tābhir eva sa-santoṣaṃ sucitritena bhavatā tā

GR14muktacau:881: tac chrutvā campakalatā prāha -- mugdhe! ujjvala-maṇi-saṃhitāyām eva
GR14muktacau:883: tan-niṣkṛti-vidhir bhavatyāḥ prāyeṇa gocaro na bhavatīti tayaiva
GR14muktacau:886: nāndīmukhī -- atra tat-saṃhitāṃ kas tāvaj jānāti ?
GR14muktacau:888: nāndīmukhī -- adhunā sā kilātra sabhā-madhye na vidyate |
GR14muktacau:891: nirantaraṃ tad abhyasyantī suṣṭhu taj jānantī tan nirūpayiṣyati |
GR14muktacau:892: nāndīmukhī sa-kāku -- sakhi lalite! vicārya yathocita-niṣkṛtir ādiśyatām |
GR14muktacau:893: lalitā kiñcid vihasya -- priya-sakhi! kṛta-vaylīko jano yadi sabhā-madhye
GR14muktacau:894: svayam āgatya niḥśeṣaṃ svayam aghaṃ niṣkāpaṭyena nivedyānutapati, tadaivāsya prāyaścittaṃ kāryate iti purāna-kṛdbhiḥ nirṇitam asti |
GR14muktacau:896: saṃkathya svam aghaṃ goṣṭhyāṃ paścāt tapati yaḥ sphuṭam |
GR14muktacau:897: tasyaiva niṣkṛtiḥ sāṅgā munibhiḥ kāryate'khilā || iti |
GR14muktacau:898: ity ākarṇya nāndīmukhyāṃ man-mukhaṃ sākūtam ālokayantyāṃ mayi ca
GR14muktacau:899: subala-madhumaṅgalābhyāṃ saha lalitā-savidham āsādya kiñcid vivakṣamāṇe
GR14muktacau:901: viśākhā prāha -- he dhīra! kāmāturāṇāṃ na ghṛṇā na lajjeti svabhāvataḥ
GR14muktacau:902: kāminā tvayā yat kṛtaṃ tat kṛtam eva |
GR14muktacau:903: adhunā tv etat tasyāḥ puro vivicya tat sarvaṃ kathaya |
GR14muktacau:904: tato'haṃ smitam apavārya sānutāpam iva -- lalite! caturthe'hani
GR14muktacau:905: vighaṭita-gavānveṣaṇe gaurī-tīrtham evāptasya mama gaurī-mandirān niḥsṛtya kācid gaurī sahacarī carcikā haṭhena mad-urasi savya-kucenāhatya
GR14muktacau:906: mādhavī-catuḥśālikāntarālaṃ mām ānīya kampamānasya mama mukhe tāmbūla-carvitaṃ pradāya yat kiñcit kṛtavatī tan-mohito'haṃ kim api nāvediṣam |
GR14muktacau:909: mālya-haraṇa-kuṇḍa-taṭa-nikaṭa-mandārodyāna-parisare sā carcikā punar apy āvirbhūya balenaiva mama vāma-gaṇḍaṃ paricumbya mukhe svādhara-pīyūṣam
GR14muktacau:912: madhumaṅgalo vihasyāha -- vayasya! bhadrataram idaṃ niṣkṛtaṃ yat tad aghasyaiva vṛddhiṃ vitanoti |
GR14muktacau:913: tato'ham -- dhiṅ mūrkha! kim api na jānāsi |
GR14muktacau:920: ity ādivad ucchiṣṭa-bhojana-doṣam ucchiṣṭa-bhojanam eva darayati |
GR14muktacau:924: jñāta-sāro'pi khalv ekaḥ sandigdhaḥ syāt sakarmaṇi |
GR14muktacau:926: iti niśamya lalitā smayamānā prāha -- he deva! devyā saha devasyaiva
GR14muktacau:927: saṅgaḥ sampatsyate tat katham asmākaṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ sā gocarībhavatu ?
GR14muktacau:928: tato mayoktaṃ -- lalite! sā kutrāpi mānuṣi bhavatīnām adūra eva virājamānā vartate |
GR14muktacau:929: tataḥ sarvāsu sakautukaṃ sa-śaṅkaṃ karṇākarṇi keyam iti vicārayantīṣu rādhā svagataṃ -- etasya dhūrtasya narma-nyāsa etad-goṣṭhyām eva bhaviṣyatīti lakṣyate |
GR14muktacau:930: viśākhā -- deva! kathyatām kutra sā yathaināṃ saṃstutya sabhā-madhye
GR14muktacau:933: tato'haṃ -- viśākhe! bhavad-goṣṭhyām eva taḍid iva virājayantī sā |
GR14muktacau:936: iti mad-gambhīrālāpam ākarṇya lalitāyām anyāsu sarvāsu ca ātmany ātmani tāṃ narma-bhaṅgīm āśaṅkya parasparam ālokayantīṣu viśākhayoktaṃ -- lampaṭa!
GR14muktacau:945: viśākhā -- iyam api na eṣāpi na asāv api na |
GR14muktacau:947: tato'haṃ -- dhūrte! tvam eva tāṃ jānāsi |
GR14muktacau:949: lalitā -- hā hā sakhi viśākhe! tāṃ prakāśya vikalasyāsya kārya-siddhiṃ
GR14muktacau:951: viśākhā smṛtim abhinīya -- lalite! yā mayā jñāyate sā devī-manuṣyayor
GR14muktacau:953: nāndīmukhī -- goṣṭha-madhye devīṃ mānuṣīṃ vā vinā kā punar itarā ?
GR14muktacau:956: viśākhā smitvāha -- sā durmukhī padmā yayāsya vyalīkaṃ kṛtam asti |
GR14muktacau:957: tuṅgavidyā -- sakhi viśākhe! sā śaṅkhinīti saṃkathya kathaṃ kaluṣam utpādayasi
GR14muktacau:958: ? eṣā khalu bahutithaṃ kātyāyanī-devyā bahutara-sevā-prasādataḥ sākṣāt kātyāyanī vṛtāsti |
GR14muktacau:959: tac chrutvā madhumaṅgalādiṣu hasatsu mayoktaṃ -- viśākhe! tal-lajjayā yadi tvam anyataḥ kṣipasi tan mayaiva kathyate |
GR14muktacau:961: tato mayoktaṃ -- sā carcikā-devī tvam eva |
GR14muktacau:962: tataḥ sā sarvāḥ smayamānā vilokya sakampādharam āha -- aye cañcala vañcaka!
GR14muktacau:971: iti śrutvā rādhā anuccaiḥ sa-ślāgham āha -- priya-sakhi viśākhe! vijayinī bhava yan man-mānasa-gata-sambodhanoktyā māṃ sukhayanty asi ||
GR14muktacau:972: raṅgadevī -- sakhi viśākhe! tvaṃ kathaṃ kupasīty uktvā sakhi lalite!
GR14muktacau:982: iti śrutvā lalitā vihasya -- ārya madhumaṅgala! sakhe subala! sannidhāya śrūyatām prāyaścittam
GR14muktacau:987: lalitā -- mugdhe! tato'pi rāja-putrāṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ syād dviṣaḍ-guṇā iti pāṭhaḥ saṃhitā-saṃmato mayā jñāyate |
GR14muktacau:989: citrā -- etac-chāstra-vijñayā tvayā yaj jñāyate tad eva satyam |
GR14muktacau:991: katidhānena yuvarājena vayaṃ na rakṣitāḥ sma ? tasmād
GR14muktacau:996: snātvā tathā mānasa-gaṅgāyāṃ tri-dināni snātaḥ sann eka-viṃśati-dināni
GR14muktacau:999: iti śravaṇena kapaṭa-kopa-vikaṭo madhumaṅgalaḥ prāha -- lalitike!
GR14muktacau:1004: tad aham atidrutaṃ gatvā vṛttam etat sa-viśeṣam āśrāvya etat-pitarāv atrānīya etat saṅkaṭād amuṃ mocayan sauhṛdaṃ vitanomi |
GR14muktacau:1005: iti nigadya phutkṛtya drutaṃ gacchantaṃ madhumaṅgalaṃ subalaḥ kare gṛhītvā balād iva nivartayāmāsa
GR14muktacau:1012: yathā rādhā priyā viṣṇos tasyāḥ kuṇḍaṃ priyaṃ tathā ||
GR14muktacau:1014: vaikuṇṭhāj janito varā madhupurī tatrāpi rāsotsavāt vṛndāraṇyam udāra-pāṇi-ramaṇāt tatrāpi govardhanaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1015: rādhā-kuṇḍam ihāpi gokula-pateḥ premāmṛtāplavanāt kuryād asya virājato giri-taṭe sevāṃ vivekī na kaḥ ||
GR14muktacau:1019: dakṣiṇa-taṭe giri-darī-vāsinyāḥ pūrṇāḥ pulindya urugāyety ādi
GR14muktacau:1024: kvacit svayaṃ vā lajjām abhinīya mṛdu
GR14muktacau:1029: etad-avasaraa eva netra-kuṇanena goṣṭhī-madhyāt tulasīm āhūya bandhurātibandhura-sugandhī-gandha-phalī-sadṛkṣa-dakṣiṇa-kara-kaniṣṭhāṅg
GR14muktacau:1034: tatas taṃ lalitā śirasi nidhāya sakhībhiḥ saha rahaḥ paripaṭhya nāndīmukhī-kare sa-smitam
GR14muktacau:1036: nāndīmukhī smitvānandam abhinīya vakṣasi nidhāya vācayati --
GR14muktacau:1050: -vigrahasya dhīra-lalitasyāsya etāvat kaṭhora-prāyaścitta-śravaṇena mama hṛdayaṃ navanītam iva vidravavad āste |
GR14muktacau:1056: prāyaścittaṃ kevala-mukha-śodhanāya ca tantreṇa vidhāyāsmin nirdoṣe vihite mama mahaty eva nirvṛtir jāyate ity alam ativistareṇa ||
GR14muktacau:1065: vidhāya premṇā śanaiḥ śanais tathā pāyayitavyaṃ yathāsya sukumārasya duritaṃ drutam apayāti parama-sukham api niṣpadyate iti ||
GR14muktacau:1066: iti niśamya sāntarānandaṃ rādhā-nikuñjam avalokayati mayi smitvā lalitā prāha -- yadyapi kṛtānutāpa-lakṣāṇām ity ādi sāmānya-vacanāntaraṃ
GR14muktacau:1069: iti viśeṣa-vacanena sāmānya-viśeṣayor viśeṣa-vidhir balavān iti nyāyenāsya
GR14muktacau:1070: dviṣaḍ-guṇam eva prāyaścittaṃ yuktam eva pṛthak pṛthak nirūpitam asti tathāpy ājñā gurūṇāṃ hy avicāraṇīyeti tad-ājñāṃ śirasi nidhāya tantreṇaiva
GR14muktacau:1072: tataḥ śiṣye vidyā garīyasīti mayokte lalitā sākūtam āha -- nāndīmukhi!
GR14muktacau:1075: hariṇīm etāṃ parihāya bāḍham ayasa-vidagdha-kṛṣṇasāra-yuvā sakhī-sthaly-upaśalye
GR14muktacau:1083: ca ta-sahacarīṃ cañcalo'yam avidagdha-bhramaraḥ punaḥ punar uḍḍīyoḍḍiyānusarati tad etad ālambanāvadagdhya-rūpa-vairūpyeṇa vṛndāvana-maheśvarī-sahacarī
GR14muktacau:1084: madhurā ratir aprasannā satī etac chyāmala-rasaṃ na puṣṇāti |
GR14muktacau:1089: tarhi tat-priya-sakhī madhurā ratiḥ svayam eva paramojjvalā bhavantī etad abhīṣṭa-kāmān sampādayiṣyaty eva |
GR14muktacau:1090: ity akhila-vilāsa-rasa-mādhurīm āpīya satyabhāmā vyājahāra -- prāṇanātha!
GR14muktacau:1092: apūrva-rasa-sāgare nimajjantyā mama manāg api tṛpteḥ paryāptir na vidyate |
GR14muktacau:1093: kṛṣṇaḥ -- priye! etad gokula-vilāsānanda-niṣkuṭe viharamāṇasya mama tvat-praśna
GR14muktacau:1096: kṛṣṇaḥ -- tataḥ subalaḥ sasmitam āha -- priyavayasya! priya-sakhīyam
GR14muktacau:1097: indulekhā durdurūḍhāt sva-bhartur bhāsvarākhyād udvignā mām iṅgitena prerayati |
GR14muktacau:1098: tad asyāḥ mauktik-mūlyaṃ nirṇīya tad dattvā jhaṭiti gṛha-kṛtyāya gantum ājñāpyatām |
GR14muktacau:1099: tato'haṃ -- sakhe satyaṃ satyaṃ mayy atīvānurakteyaṃ mām api tyaktuṃ na
GR14muktacau:1101: tato'pi suṣṭhu bibhetīty aham api jānāmi |
GR14muktacau:1106: aham apy asahyaitad-virahas tāvad asyāḥ vakṣoja-parvatopari
GR14muktacau:1115: tataḥ sakampādharaṃ kuṭilaṃ mām avalokayantīm indulekhām ālokya smayamānā tuṅgavidyā prāha -- nāgara! raṅgadevīyaṃ yathārtha-nāmnī tad asyā mauktika-paṇaḥ praṇiyatām |
GR14muktacau:1116: tato'ham -- sakhi raṅgadevi! rāsa-madhye tava lāsya-vilāsollāsaḥ santatam
GR14muktacau:1120: tad ehi sva-vakṣoja-kanaka-kumbhau mad-urasi tathā nartaya yathāham ānanditaḥ sakala-vallavī-samudaya-sarvasva-bhūta-mat-svādhara-pīyūṣa-mahā-prasāda-dānena
GR14muktacau:1122: tac chrutvā apaihi bhaṇḍa-śekhara! apaihīty uktvā kuṭilaṃ mām avalokya viśākhā-pṛṣṭhāntaritāyāṃ raṅgadevyāṃ sudevī sa-smitam āha --
GR14muktacau:1124: ballavī-kula-bhukta-muka-sujuṣṭa-mahā-prasādāsvādaneneyaṃ tvaritam eva siddhim āsādayantī sphuṭam asmān api siddhārthāḥ kṛtavaty eva |
GR14muktacau:1127: tato'ham -- sakhe subala! sudevīyam akṣa-keli-dakṣeti prasiddhā tac chapatham eva dadad asmi kenāpi kasyāpi pakṣo na grāhyaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1130: tatra yady aham anayā suṣṭhu jīyeyaṃ, tarhi vāmena vakṣojena
GR14muktacau:1131: mad-vakṣṣasi mām āpīḍya mama sarvasva-bhūtam adharaṃ dviḥ pibatu |
GR14muktacau:1132: yadi vā mayedaṃ jīyate, tadā sva-dakṣiṇa-kaṭhina-vakṣojaṃ mad-dakṣiṇa-kareṇa
GR14muktacau:1133: nikāmaṃ pīḍayitvā dviḥ svādharāmṛtam āpāyayatv iti |
GR14muktacau:1134: tataḥ sā bhrū-bhaṅgena mām avalokayantī sāsūyaṃ viśākhām āha -- ayi
GR14muktacau:1137: sāmpratam eva muktā-maṇi-vyāpāram ārabhya tato vṛddhim alabhamānaḥ punaḥ sva-vṛttim
GR14muktacau:1140: kāñcana-mudrā-tatim itaḥ prakāma-mūlyena pragṛhya tayaiva muktāphalāny
GR14muktacau:1143: iti calitum udyatāñcale gṛhītvānaṅga-mañjaryā nivartitā sa-krodham iva sākūtaṃ punar āha -- keli-lampaṭa! nikāmam akṣa-keli-nipuṇeyam anaṅga-mañjarī
GR14muktacau:1144: tvayā saha dīvyantī te garva-parvataṃ kharvayiṣyati |
GR14muktacau:1145: tatas tad-vacana-mādhuryam avadhārya mayoktaṃ -- asyās tv abalāyās
GR14muktacau:1148: mama ca mānasa-madhukaraḥ param asyām anavaratam anuvrajyati |
GR14muktacau:1149: ataḥ samucita-paṇam antarāpi sutārāṇi suvṛttāni bahūni mauktikāny apy asyai vitariṣyāmi
GR14muktacau:1151_0: smara-puñjarākṣarāṇy asyāḥ pañcāśad aṅga-pratyaṅgeṣu sva-hastena vinyasya svāṅgaṃ svāṅgenālinṅgya mantreṇaināṃ vyāpayya tathā
GR14muktacau:1151_1: siddha-mantram ekam upadiśāmi yathā tad-grahaṇa-mātrād anaṅgaṃ sāṅgaṃ viracayya santuṣṭena tena prasādīkṛta-sva-sarvasva-svarūpa-vilāsa-ratnāni
GR14muktacau:1153: ādhāsyate yena viṣama-śara-vilāsācāryeti padavīm āsādya dvi-guṇaṃ mām eva bhaktyā
GR14muktacau:1155: iti mad-bhāṣita-kusuma-stavakaṃ śravaṇāvataṃsīkṛtya sakampādharaṃ mām īṣad avalokayantī smita-subhaga-vadanābhir ābhiḥ snehenotphullatayā tad-agrajayā ca
GR14muktacau:1156: sa-smitaṃ sa-snehaṃ ca nirīkṣyamāṇā tulasī-raṅgaṇamālikayor upapṛṣṭham antarhitāsīt ||
GR14muktacau:1158: kṛṣṇaḥ -- tadānīm eva mallī-bhṛṅgībhyām ānīya dattaṃ lekha-dvayam |
GR14muktacau:1159: sarvābhiḥ samam eva vācayitvā paramotphullā lalitā tayor ekaṃ lekhaṃ subala-haste
GR14muktacau:1163: tataḥ subale lekham udghāṭya laghu laghu vācayati sati nāndīmukhī --
GR14muktacau:1167: ahaṃ -- sakhe! vācaya mamāpi mahatī śuśrūṣā vartate |
GR14muktacau:1175: anavarata-virājamānam api vraja-maṇḍale śaśvan nitarāṃ virājatām || kāṛyam idam anyad api avadhehi priya-jana-sakāśāt kara-grahaṇam anucitam iti bahutaram
GR14muktacau:1177: kara-dravyam apahāyaiva etāvad-dinaṃ kim api noktam āsīt |
GR14muktacau:1179: mauktika-vyayena kṣubhyad-guru-jana-dīyamāna-mahānuyoga-nicayena kṣaṇam api nirvṛti-lavam alabhamānayā yat kiñcin mayā vijñāpyamānam asti |
GR14muktacau:1183: lalitayā saha lekha-pratilekham ācārya samucita-kara-dravym iha tvaritam eva prahitya dīyatāṃ, yathā dravyeṇaiva mathurāto mauktikāny ānāyya gurubhyaḥ
GR14muktacau:1187: yadi bhavādṛśām aśaktiḥ syāt tarhi pañcabhir militvā samucita-mūlyaṃ
GR14muktacau:1189: etad-dravya-parivartanena mauktikani lalitā-haste deyānīti kiṃ bahunā
GR14muktacau:1191: etan niśamya paramānanda-pūrṇenāpi mayā sākūtam uktaṃ -- ayi malli! ayi
GR14muktacau:1194: tatas tan-nikuñja-diśaṃ tiryag-avalokayann ahaṃ -- kutra vartate sā ?
GR14muktacau:1199: tato'haṃ -- sakhe subala! ,amue liṭiolayā lalitayaiva kasyacid dvārā lekhayitvā lekho'yaṃ vitīrṇo'sti |
GR14muktacau:1202: tato'ham -- sakhe! tat tāvad idaṃ darśayati tad-dhastād ākṛṣya lekham ālokya
GR14muktacau:1203: sa-camatkāram ātmagataṃ -- aho akṣarāṇāṃ paṅkti-vistṛtir iyaṃ man-netrayoḥ
GR14muktacau:1206: kṛtān iti bhaṅgyā vikhyāpya prakāśaṃ vihasya āścaryam āścaryam ākāśa-kusumam iva dhūrtābhir etābhiḥ kim apy anyad akasmād eva samutthāpitam |
GR14muktacau:1208_0: vikaṭa-kuṭināṭi-kapaṭa-nāṭikā-tāṇḍavodbhaṭa-naṭāCārya-mahā-naṭīm imāṃ tad advitīyāṃ durlalitāṃ lalitāṃ vāg-vilāsābhāsa-mātreṇaiova
GR14muktacau:1208_1: parājity a avatiṣṭha te dhriyate yāvad eko'pi ripus tāvat kutaḥ sukham ity ādi saṃsmṛtya sarvāsām asmad-vṛndāvana-rājya-kāṅkṣiṇīnāṃ
GR14muktacau:1208_2: dhūrtānāṃ tatim imām ito vṛndāvanāt jhaṭiti vidrāvaya |
GR14muktacau:1213: lalitā -- parama-kapaṭin! tad-rājya-mahābhiṣeka-mahotsavaṃ samakṣam ākalayyāpi kim evaṃ gopāyasi ?
GR14muktacau:1214: tato'ham -- lalite! samakṣa-darśanaṃ tāvad-dūre 'stu tac-chravaṇam api jātam astīti
GR14muktacau:1217: ballava-sādhvī-śata-dharmollaṅghana-janita-tamaḥ-pracayenāntarhitam asty asya cetas tat-saṃsargī ca tādṛśa iti etad-vayasyayor anayor api |
GR14muktacau:1218: tat katham ete smarantu nāma ? tasmāt tat kathana-pīyūṣa-prasyandena karṇa-vivareṣu praveśiten bāḍham amīṣāṃ cetāṃsi kāruṇyenāvirbhāvaya yathaiṣāṃ smṛtiḥ sampadyate |
GR14muktacau:1219: tatas tadānīm evāgatāṃ sarvābhir evānanditāṃ vṛndām āliṅgya lalitā sa-smitam
GR14muktacau:1224: viniṣyandamāna-tan-mahotsava-rasa-makarandam aham apy āpātum āgatāsmi tat tvayaiva pariveṣyatām
GR14muktacau:1225: lalitā sānandam -- bhadraṃ sarvair avadhāya śrūyatām |
GR14muktacau:1244: lalitā tato mayaiva sucīna-vasanena śanaiḥ śanair aṅgāny āmṛjya
GR14muktacau:1253: lyādibhir yathā-sthānaṃ yathā-śobhaṃ nikāmam alaṅkṛtety ardhokte
GR14muktacau:1255: āsādayantī sā lalitā viśākhayā sasambhramaṃ pṛṣṭhe samālambya karṇe rādhe kṛṣṇa rādhe kṛṣṇeti kīrtanāmṛtena sandhukṣitā kṣaṇaṃ maunena dhairyam ālambya punaḥ kathayitum ārebhe ||
GR14muktacau:1256: tadānīm eva mūrcchitāṃ lalitām ālakṣya -- hā
GR14muktacau:1259: hā bhagavan! bhakta-vatsala! bhāskara-deva! rakṣa rakṣa |
GR14muktacau:1263_0: jīvitām ācārya kilaitat-paṇenaiva saṃkrīya dāsī krityatām iyaṃ tapasvinī rādhiketi vilapya sāśru-dhāraṃ vegena tām āliṅgitum
GR14muktacau:1264: ity avakalanāt trāsena sāntaḥkampaṃ raṅgaṇavallī-tulasībhyāṃ tat-savidham
GR14muktacau:1265: upalabdhaṃ tato raṅnaṇavallyā vāma-bhujayā tat-pṛṣṭham avaṣṭabhya
GR14muktacau:1266: dakṣiṇa-kareṇa mṛdu mṛdu mṛjyamānā hā nātha rakṣa rakṣa iti sāśru-pravāhaṃ
GR14muktacau:1268: bījyamānā bāhyam upālabhya susthām iva lalitām ālokayantī sānandā babhūva
GR14muktacau:1269: lalitā -- huṃ ? tāṃ tadā tadānandocchalita-sāttvika-bhāvālaṅkāra-bhūṣita-sabhya-gaṇaiḥ saha bhagavatī vicitra-ratna-siṃhāsanopari samupaveśya
GR14muktacau:1274: tac-chravaṇānanda-samutthita-sāttvikādy-anubhāvān yatnenāvṛtya kiñcid vihasya mayoktaṃ -- lalite! etat kathaṃ mayā na jñāyate etena kiṃ vo rājyam āyātam
GR14muktacau:1275: pratyuta etad uṭṭaṅkanāt sva-mukhenaiva bhavatībhir yuṣmat-sahitam idaṃ rājyaṃ mamaiveti nirṇītam |
GR14muktacau:1277: tato'ham -- yato vṛndāvana-purandarasya mamaiva rājñītvena mad-iṅgitenaiva
GR14muktacau:1279: viśākhā vihasya -- asaṅgata-bhāṣin! purandarasya mahiṣi devy eva bhavati |
GR14muktacau:1280: sā khalu śacīti prasiddhā svarge vasati |
GR14muktacau:1283: mayoktaṃ -- tarkācārya-śiromaṇiṃ-manye viśākhe! tvaṃ suṣṭhu jaḍāsi yad bāraṃ bāram adhītam api pratyakṣa-khaṇḍaṃ tvayā vismṛtam eva |
GR14muktacau:1286: yadi bhavat-sahacarī mat-preyasī na syāt tarhi
GR14muktacau:1287: mad-vakṣaḥ-sthāsakāhṛta-mṛgamadena kathaṃ bhagavatī tāṃ tilakinīṃ cakāra ?
GR14muktacau:1295: kāmākhyā-nāma-śyāmala-devatāyāḥ mahāprasāda-mṛgamada-mālābhir eva sā kila bhagavatyā vibhūṣitā
GR14muktacau:1297: tuṅgavidyā -- sakhi lalite! sādhu sambodhitaṃ yad ayam alīka-purandara eva
GR14muktacau:1305: kṛtāsambhavālīka-sambodhana-pūrvaka-stavābhāsenaiva nisargāgambhīra eṣa kṛṣībalo bāḍham ātmanaḥ purnadaratā-mananena
GR14muktacau:1320: ikasyāsya, tad avadhi yaśaḥ-pratāpa-prakāśa-laharī brahmāṇḍa-bhare yādṛśī prasarantī vartate
GR14muktacau:1321: tām anubhavantībhir bhavatībhir api sākṣān mahendratvaṃ yan na manyate, tad bhavatīnām anayo'yaṃ mahān eveti mayi prabhāsate |
GR14muktacau:1322: iti niśamya sa-smitaṃ nayana-kūṇanena sa-smita-lajjita-man-mukham ālokya parasparaṃ cālokayantīṣu tāsu citrā vihasya - bhoḥ katham asau
GR14muktacau:1324: tuṅgavidyā - citre! iti cet sa katham atrāgataḥ ?
GR14muktacau:1326_0: para-ramaṇīto'yam iti sarvataḥ samadhigamya krodhinyā devā padāghātena nirbhartstas tāṃ parama-sukhada-tan-nija-bhavanaṃ
GR14muktacau:1326_1: ca nirvedataḥ parityajya vanam idam āgatya parama-mañjula-navīna-gopatvam ivāsādya
GR14muktacau:1327: puraścaraṇa-vidhānenaiva vṛndāvaneśvaryāḥ karṣako bhūtvā sukhena samayaṃ gamayann asti
GR14muktacau:1329: bāṭika-rūpa-prāghuṇe' smin sneha eva nikāmaṃ vidhīyatām |
GR14muktacau:1330: tac chrutvā sarvāsu smera-mukhīṣu nāndīmukhī vihasya - sakhi citre! vraja eva nitya-vihāriṇi vrajendra-nandane yat kiñcit tvayedaṃ vyāhṛtam |
GR14muktacau:1334: tataḥ smitvā muni-vratam ālambitavatyāṃ citrāyāṃ vṛndā sānandam āha -
GR14muktacau:1335: nāndīmukhi! asyāḥ parama-vidagdhāyā gūḍhābhiprāyaḥ sphuṭaṃ mayaiva
GR14muktacau:1337: nāndīmukhīn - katham asya devendratvam ? tat prakaṭaya |
GR14muktacau:1340: tathā dīvyanti viśeṣeṇa dyotante iti devāḥ |
GR14muktacau:1341: paramojjvala-tejas-taraṅga-hṛdyādbhuta-saundaryāmṛta-pravāha-śālinas teṣāṃ teṣām apīndro mahā-parivṛḍha iti devendras tebhyo'pi paramotkarṣeṇa suṣṭhu virājamāna ity arthaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1342: nāndīmukhī sa-smitaṃ - samīcīno'yam artho vivṛtaḥ kintu para-ramaṇī-rata
GR14muktacau:1344: vṛndā - parā anyā tathā parā vipakṣā, tathā parā paramotkṛṣṭā, parā cāsau ramaṇī ceti para-ramaṇī śrī-rādhikā tasyāṃ rataḥ paramāśaktas tām eva paramānurāgeṇa ramayann ity arthaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1345: campakalatā smitvā - vṛnde! devy api nirūpyatām |
GR14muktacau:1346: vṛndā - nādevo devam arcayed iti caṇḍikā-paricaryāparatvāt asya devasya bhāryeti vā |
GR14muktacau:1347: kiṃ vā amaṅgale maṅgala-śabdavad iyaṃ devī |
GR14muktacau:1352: nāndīmukhī padāghāteneti dhārṣṭyātiśayena tasyā anuttamatā sphuṭaiva kintu
GR14muktacau:1355: kiṃ vā parama-sukhaṃ dārayatīti parama-sukhadaṃ yat tasyā devyā nija-bhavanaṃ
GR14muktacau:1357: nāndīmukhī - aho! śabdānāṃ gūḍhārtha-vijñāyās tava vyākhyā-kauśalaṃ tad asmādṛśībhir duravagāho navīna-gopatvādi-padānāṃ gūḍho'rthaḥ kṛpayā prakāśyatām |
GR14muktacau:1360: a-śṛṅgāra-dhāritvaṃ mañjula-navīna-gopatvaṃ tatrāpi navīna-śabdena tasya prathamato nitya-nūtanatā ca dhvanitā |
GR14muktacau:1369: ī-bharam anubhavantyāḥ śrī-vṛndāvana-rājadhānī-vilāsinyāḥ karṣaka ākarṣako bhūtvā tena tām unmādya nija-nikaṭam ākṛṣyety arthaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1373: tayā sahānavaratam anirvacanīya-madhura-khelā-vilāsa-tat-paraḥ san sadā virājata eveti
GR14muktacau:1377: sa-lavaṇa-takra-ślathita-bhakta-bhakṣaṇāya tad-udyāna-pālanaṃ parityajya sāmpratam āsāṃ gṛha-pālī vṛttāsti |
GR14muktacau:1383: mallī-bhṛṅgyau - devi lalite! svāminyā yad anya-patreṇa likhitam asti |
GR14muktacau:1386: mallī-bhṛṅgyau - samucita-kara-dāne yaḥ kuyuktim uttolya virodham ācarati so'tra
GR14muktacau:1391: dṛḍhaṃ nibadhya komalāyāḥ priya-sakhyāḥ savidham ānītvaiva jaṭilābhimanyu-pārśve yuvābhyām eva satvaraṃ samarpyatām |
GR14muktacau:1392: yathā sa yāva-grāma-siṃho'bhimanyur eva tāḍana-pūrvakaṃ sva-karaṃ gṛhṇāti |
GR14muktacau:1393: madhumaṅgalaḥ antaḥ-sa-bhayam iva - vayasya! kiñcin nigūḍhaṃ kāryaṃ mama gṛhe vidyate |
GR14muktacau:1395: tato'haṃ - dhig brāhmaṇa! katham abalā-vāg-āḍambareṇa mad-agrato'pi
GR14muktacau:1397: madhumaṅgalaḥ - mahāśūra! ghaṭṭī-pālasya tava govardhane dāna-vartanyāṃ
GR14muktacau:1399: yat tasmin dine etābhir eva vṛndāvana-kara-nimittaṃ gāndharvā-nideśena nijottarīya-paṭāñcalena baddhā nīyamānam api māṃ vīkṣamāṇa eva vilakṣas tvam āsīḥ |
GR14muktacau:1400: aham eva nija-bhūsuratvaṃ vivṛtya bhāgyena kathañcid urvārito'smi |
GR14muktacau:1401: ity uktvā bhītim anukṛtya palāyantam iva taṃ kare gṛhītvā parāvartya mayoktaṃ -
GR14muktacau:1402: lalite! tādṛśyāḥ komalābalāyā api katham ahaṃ karaṃ dāsyāmi ? pratyuta balāt kāmam ādāsya eva |
GR14muktacau:1403: iti niśamya netra-bhāgena mām īṣad avalokayantī rādhā susmitā āsīt |
GR14muktacau:1404: nāndīmukhī - citre! bāṭikā-prāghuṇa ity asya kas tāvad abhiprāyaḥ ?
GR14muktacau:1405: lalitā - nāndīmukhi! taj jānaty api kathaṃ pṛcchasi ? yat
GR14muktacau:1408: nāndīmukhī - priya-janma-bhūmes tyāgena kiṃ tāvat kāraṇam ?
GR14muktacau:1409: rādhā auccaiḥ - tat-sthānasyāsvācchandyāt janatādhikyena tad-grāme nagara iva jāte
GR14muktacau:1411: yāsena janita-bahu-vidha-vikarmābhilāṣasyāsiddhatvāt nirjane'smin mahati ghane vṛndāvane kulābalā-kulānāṃ geha-deha adhara-daśana-vasanāni
GR14muktacau:1413: ity evaṃ lalitayā sphuṭaṃ vyāhṛte sa-smitaṃ sākūtam āha - lalite!
GR14muktacau:1415: rādhā punar anuccaiḥ - satyam eva kathyate |
GR14muktacau:1419: lalitācāryayā pūrvam api vihita-niṣkṛtena nirvāsya, nirveda-kṛta-vivekena tāsām eva kṛṣi-vṛttam
GR14muktacau:1420: eva nija-dharmam ācarya prakāmaṃ śasyāny utpādya tābhyaḥ pradāya tat svāṃśam api svayam ādāya tāḥ svātmānam apy ānandayan mahāśucir iva virājate |
GR14muktacau:1421: ity eva sphuṭaṃ viśākhāpi sa-smitaṃ bhāṣitavatī |
GR14muktacau:1422: tatas tan niśamya sarveṣu hāsa-kolāhala-mahotsavam āviṣkurvatsu
GR14muktacau:1424: mayoktam - sakhe subala! dhūrtābhir imābhir narma-bhaṅgī-miṣeṇa mama
GR14muktacau:1426: subalaḥ - na kevalam adhikāritaiva dūrīkṛtā kintu karṣako'pi kṛto'si |
GR14muktacau:1427: vṛndā - subala! tvaṃ bahu-śruto vicakṣaṇas tathānayor api parama-snigdhaḥ
GR14muktacau:1428: | tat kathaṃ nāndīmukhyā sahānayorḥ parama-snigdhayor api rājya-hetor
GR14muktacau:1430: tato bhadraṃ bhadram iti mayā lalitayā cokte subalaḥ prāha - vayasya!
GR14muktacau:1431: prathamaṃ tāvat katham āsām etad rājyaṃ tal lalitaiva kathayatu |
GR14muktacau:1432: paścād bhavān api kathaṃ vā bhavad-rājyaṃ taj jñāpayatu |
GR14muktacau:1433: tato'haṃ - subala! yāsāṃ vraja-deva-kanyānām ajñānenāpi saṅgam ācarya
GR14muktacau:1434: jāta-vyalīko'haṃ prāyaścittena śuddho'bhavaṃ sa kathaṃ tābhiḥ samam api punar vākovākaṃ vistarayāmi ?
GR14muktacau:1437: śyāmala-viṣama-śara-sarovara-mahā-tīrthe punaḥ punaḥ snapanena śuddīkṛtā eva sva-nikaṭam āpitāḥ santi tac cīrṇa-niṣkṛtayor ubhayoḥ saṃvāde doṣo nāsti |
GR14muktacau:1446: subalaḥ - lalite! madhyasthena mayā yathārtham eva vaktavyam |
GR14muktacau:1451: vṛndāvana-rājyādhipatyaṃ kim āyāti ? kintu tatra cet mahā-pramāṇam asti,
GR14muktacau:1453: lalitā - pratyakṣaṃ parokṣam api bahutara-purāṇa-vacana-kulam asti |
GR14muktacau:1455: pratyakṣa-parokṣayoḥ pratyakṣam eva balīya ity anusāreṇa pratyakṣam eva grāhyam |
GR14muktacau:1457: lalitā - mayā kiṃ tad vaktavyam ? yuṣmākam anubhūtam eva tat |
GR14muktacau:1461: dundubhi-vāditrādi-kolāhala-pūrvakaṃ kṛto'tra mahā-siṃhāsane you ratnābhiṣekaḥ sa ca trilokī-vāsiṣu kasya vā paramānanda-pradāyako na saṃvṛtto'sti |
GR14muktacau:1462: tataḥ subalaḥ - lalite! etat tu tāvad anyathātvena nirūpya priya-vayasyo
GR14muktacau:1463: yuṣmān apy ātmasāt kartuṃ virājamāno vartate |
GR14muktacau:1464: lalitā - subala! etac ced bhavad-dvipada-gopa-priya-vayasyaḥ satyam eva vakti tarhi vṛndāvana-rājye æbhiṣiktāyā mahā-siṃhāsana-sthāyā ity ādi tathaitasyāś
GR14muktacau:1465: caraṇānujīvino mamety ādi vyāhṛtya svāmy asau sāmpratam api kathaṃ tac
GR14muktacau:1466: caraṇa-paricaraṇa-mātraika-lābhāya tan-mantra-rājam ādātum āgraheṇādhyavasyann astīty ādi sarvaṃ kiṃ bhavādṛgbhir vismṛtam ?
GR14muktacau:1467: nāndīmukhī smitvā - lalite! asya vilāsino rāja-putrasya
GR14muktacau:1469: mahā-kāmukasya yat pralapitaṃ tat kim atra pramāṇaṃ syāt ? anyac ced gāḍhaṃ pramāṇaṃ syād darśaya |
GR14muktacau:1470: vṛndā - yad yat pramāṇam iyaṃ darśayati, tat tad evāsyonmādino
GR14muktacau:1475: nāndīmukhī - vṛnde! tat tvayaiva tāvat kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:1476: vṛndā - premnā nijāsādhāraṇa-sārūpya-dāna-pūrvakam iyaṃ vṛndāṭavī priya-sakhyā sva-priya-sakhītve nityaṃ nirūpitāstīti |
GR14muktacau:1483: dṛśor īṣad ghūrṇan-nava-kuvalayānāṃ samudayas tathā līlās tiryak-kamana-gamanonmatta-hariṇaḥ
GR14muktacau:1491: alaṃ veṇer udyan-mada-śikhi-śikhaṇḍāvalir asau śruter muñjāyuktir madana-dhanuṣo jyā-dyuti-muṣaḥ
GR14muktacau:1492: alaṃ bilvaṃ tālaṃ karakam udayac cāru-kucayoḥ
GR14muktacau:1520: pare ye muktāḥ syuḥ sthira-cara-padārthā vraja-bhuvaḥ
GR14muktacau:1521: sadā stavyā bhavyais trijagati nikāmaṃ jana-kulaiḥ |
GR14muktacau:1523: rati-śrī-varṇyāyāḥ pariṣadi yathā yuktam api te ||12||
GR14muktacau:1531: nijām etāṃ rakṣāmy aṭavim iha gocāra-miṣataḥ
GR14muktacau:1532: kathaṃ svārūpyeṇaiva tu bhavatu vaḥ sāmpratam iyam ||14||
GR14muktacau:1534: sakhitvaṃ yo yasya vrajati nija-sārūpyam athavā na cet tasya syān no bhavati param anyasya hi tadā |
GR14muktacau:1535: kathaṃ no gṛhṇāsi druta-gatir idaṃ hanta kathayan
GR14muktacau:1536: svayaṃ gatvā lakṣmīṃ tad inasamarūpaṃ gaṇam api ||15||
GR14muktacau:1537: tan niśamya sāṭṭa-hāsaṃ madhumaṅgalaḥ - bho asatya-vādini vṛnde!
GR14muktacau:1540: nāndīmukhī - lalite! vijña-prācīna-munīśvara-vacanaṃ vinā ko'pi nirasto na bhaviṣyati tasmāt purāṇa-vacanam eva darśaya |
GR14muktacau:1541: lalitā - asya pakṣam āśritya tādṛgbhir evaṃ cet kathyate tadā tatra gatvā bhagavatyāḥ sakāśād bahūni purāṇa-vacanāni śrūyantām |
GR14muktacau:1547: vṛndā smṛtim abhinīya - atra subahūni vacanāni santi |
GR14muktacau:1548_0: tāni kati pāṭhyāni kintu anyeṣu deśeṣu anyāḥ pṛthak pṛthag devīr adhikariṇīr uktvā rādhā vṛndāvane vane iti sarvopamardakaṃ
GR14muktacau:1548_1: purāṇa-vacanaṃ bhagavatyāḥ sakāśāt kena vā na śrutam asti |
GR14muktacau:1549: tatas tāsāṃ jayābhimānena praphullatām ālokya madhumaṅgalaḥ sāṭopam āha -
GR14muktacau:1552: priya-vayasyaṃ brahma-bhavādayo'pi nirantaraṃ gāyantaḥ santīti ke vā na
GR14muktacau:1554: ? tataḥ śrutyā smṛtir bādhyate ity asmākam evedaṃ rājyaṃ susiddham |
GR14muktacau:1555: tat sakhe subala! vidāvayām ūritaḥ para-rājya-kāṅkṣiṇīḥ |
GR14muktacau:1556: tataḥ sakhe tvam eva me priyaṅkaraḥ priya-vayasya iti sānandaṃ madhumaṅgalam āliṅgati mayi kiñcid vailakṣyam iva rādhādhiṣṭhita-nikuñjam ālokya
GR14muktacau:1557: lalitādi-mukham ālokayantyāṃ nāndīmukhyāṃ rādhā smitvā anuccaiḥ - aho kṛṣṇeti śabda-śravaṇa-mātrata evānena mahā-dūra-darśinā tad-artham
GR14muktacau:1559: durvidha-bodhasya rolambasya śuka-tuṇḍa-pāna-smaraṇaṃ suṣṭhu samānītāḥ smaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1560: tatas tasminn eva varṇa-vinyāse solluṇṭhaṃ lalitayāpi prakāśite sati
GR14muktacau:1562: manasi manāk vicārayati mayi nāndīmukhī sacamatkāraṃ māṃ prāha - jayākāṅkṣin!
GR14muktacau:1563: ekaṃ vijñāpayitum icchāmi yadi tubhyaṃ rocate |
GR14muktacau:1565: nāndīmukhī - śyāma-vana-samāsam ācarya tvayā saha tat-samāsenaiva nyāyam ācarya tvāṃ parājitya svarājyam ādātuṃ laliteyam abhilaṣati |
GR14muktacau:1567: tad eva jānāti yad anayā tad-vana-puṣpair muhuḥ śṛṅgārito'smi |
GR14muktacau:1569: vṛndā smitvā - vyākaraṇa-vijñaṃ-manya! tvatto'pi mat-priya-sakhī lalitā
GR14muktacau:1572: vṛndā - tvat-pakṣam āśritya vivadamānāṃ māṃ kim ity ākṣipasi ?
GR14muktacau:1573: lalitā - bhoḥ samāsācārya-śārdūla! kathaṃ svepsitāpara-samāsena vibhīṣikāṃ pradarśya mat-priya-sakhyāḥ khelāspada-kṛṣṇa-vanam idam ādātuṃ vṛthaivādhyavasyasi |
GR14muktacau:1574: yato'tra nityaṃ vaiśvānaravaj jājjvalyamāna-bahuvrīhi-karmadhārayādy-avadhāraṇataḥ svayam eva dūrād
GR14muktacau:1577: tat-puruṣa-samāsaṃ viracayya para-rājyaṃ grahītuṃ katham abhilaṣasi |

GR14muktacau:1657: kṛṣṇaḥ - priye! rādhāyāḥ kāya-vyūha-rūpā eva lalitādayas tat kathaṃ nādhigamiṣyanti ?
GR14muktacau:1658: satyabhāmā - subhaga! rādhāyā narmottara-varṇa-vinyāsaḥ kathaṃ vā bhavan-mānasa-sañcārī babhūva ?
GR14muktacau:1661: gāndharvā-giridhāriṇau tat kathaṃ na sañcaratv iti | iti

GR14muktacau:1673_1: khelana-samayam uttamaṃ labdhāḥ stha ity upālabhya śrīmat-premānirvacanīya-pariṇāma-viśeṣa-svarūpeṇa

GR14muktacau:1736: tataḥ kiñcit smitvā nāndīmukhīṃ prati rādhā anuccaiḥ prāha - ayi

GR14muktacau:1740: madhumaṅgalaḥ - priya-vayasya! mad-abhīṣṭa-pāritoṣikaṃ dehi dhruvam adhunaiva bhavad-rājyābhilāṣiṇīṃ rādhāṃ tāṃ bhavat-kara-gatāṃ vidhāsye |

GR14muktacau:1838: tadāhaṃ sānandaṃ - sakhi nāndīmukhi! yathā anyā na jānanti tathā ime eva

GR14muktacau:1841: nāndīmukhī - sundara! etāḥ khalv anayor abhinnā eva tad asaṅkocaṃ prakaṭam atraiva dehi

GR14muktacau:1864: tataḥ punaḥ punar viśākhā-vadanam īṣad avalokyāhaṃ sa-smitam avadam -

GR14muktacau:1869: tac chrutvā - alīka-rājendra! tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti vyāharantī rādhā manasaiva līlā-kamalena tāṃ tāḍayati sma |
GR14muktacau:1871: viśākhā - ārya vidūṣaka-pravara madhumaṅgala! bhavad-vayasyaḥ kiṃ

GR14muktacau:1875: kapaṭa-nāṭakasya yaḥ kusumaśara-nāmā naṭas tasya suprasiddho yaḥ śuci-nāmā vidūṣakas tenāyaṃ dhūrtaḥ śiṣyatvena
GR14muktacau:1877: madhumaṅgalas tu bhinna-sampradāyi-bhojana-lampaṭa-nāmno vidūṣakācāryasya prathīyān śiṣyaḥ
GR14muktacau:1878: viśākhā - lalite! tad enaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ miṣṭānnaṃ bhojayitum icchāmi |

GR14muktacau:1880: tat katham asmākaṃ brāhmaṇetara-gopa-jātīnāṃ rāddham annam aśnātu |
GR14muktacau:1882: saṃskṛtya paramādareṇa yathāsau bhojyate tathaiva sampādanīyam |
GR14muktacau:1883: tatas tac chrutvā krodhena kampamāna iva madhumaṅgalaḥ prāha - aye avadyavādini garvitābhīrike!
GR14muktacau:1885: a-roṭikāḥ saṃbhojya mama madhura-karṇāv eva suṣṭhu kaṭūkṛtau, kiṃ punar mukha-vivaram |
GR14muktacau:1897: svapan sva-gṛham āgatya saṅgavāvadhi svapann eva tiṣṭhāmi |
GR14muktacau:1898: tatas tac-chravaṇena hāsa-kolāhale vṛtte mayoktaṃ - nāndīmukhi!
GR14muktacau:1900: eva sva-sva-grāma-sīmārthaṃ madhyastham ālambya nyāyaḥ kriyate |
GR14muktacau:1902: tad etad-rājya-hetor nyāyena kim ? mayā sahaitāḥ samaram ācarantu |
GR14muktacau:1903: tatra yasya jayo bhavet tasyaiva rājyaṃ sphuṭaṃ setsyati |
GR14muktacau:1904: ity uktvā tad-artham iva sāṭopaṃ kiñcid upasarpati mayi tāsu ca itas tataḥ
GR14muktacau:1909: ity avadhārayann ārād eva tiṣṭheti mām ābhāṣya lalitāṃ praty uvāca -
GR14muktacau:1912: bhavatīnāṃ tu śirīṣa-kusuma-mṛdulāni śarīrāṇi, tad deśa-kāla-balādikaṃ vīkṣya vivādaṃ tyaja |
GR14muktacau:1913: tac chrutvā candramukhī - bho mugdhāḥ! nāndīmukhī satyaṃ kathayati |
GR14muktacau:1917: yasyā darśanād evāyaṃ sādhvasena vihvalo bhavati |
GR14muktacau:1923: dvandve patite sarvataḥ sarve luṇṭāka-duṣṭa-gamakāḥ samutthāya samasta-mauktikāni
GR14muktacau:1927_0: tad yadi sarvābhyo rocate tarhi vayaṃ saumyā iva bhavatyaḥ samprati rājya-vārtām apahāya samucitād apy adhika-mūlyena mauktikāny
GR14muktacau:1927_1: ādāya asya cillātakasya sparśa-mātreṇaiva janiṣyamāṇa-duṣkīrti-bharād ātmānam api saṃrakṣya sva-gṛham āsādayāmaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1929_0: vṛndāvana-mahārājñī tan-muktā-pradānena drutam eva guru-prabhṛtīn santoṣya mahārāgeṇātivegena svayam atrāgatya dūrata eva
GR14muktacau:1929_1: kaṭakāṭopam avaṣṭabhya svayaṃ samaram akurvāṇā cañcala-nayanāñcala-pravaṇayā
GR14muktacau:1933: yathāyaṃ vana-madhya eva vīraṃmanyas tvaritam eva sādhvasena kampamānaḥ san bṛṃhita-hāheti-kamala-rāga-maṇi-prakara-khacita-cāru-cāṭu-cintā-rana-nikara-ra
GR14muktacau:1939: etad-rājyaṃ tad-utpanna-nikhila-mauktikādikam api samarpya svayam api tām evānucariṣyati
GR14muktacau:1940: tac-chravaṇena sānandollāsa-sasmitaṃ rādhā-kuñjaṃ tiryag avalokayati mayi
GR14muktacau:1943: vṛndāvana-cakravartinyā samam eva bhavat-samara-paripāṭī paraṃ śobhate |
GR14muktacau:1944: etāḥ punar atīva komalās tad-abhyarṇam antareṇa tvayā saha
GR14muktacau:1946: katham ācarantu tad alīka-virodhaṃ parityajya sāmpratam anyāsām api mauktikam amūlyaṃ nirṇīyatāṃ paścād bhagavaty eva rājya-nyāyaṃ vicārayiṣyati |
GR14muktacau:1947: tatas tāsāṃ sākūta-vacanam avadhāryaiva garvita-gopyo jitā jitā iti vadan
GR14muktacau:1949: vāma-muṣṭiṃ bherīkṛtya vādayan madhumaṅgalaḥ sānandaṃ bhāṇḍavam ātanoti |
GR14muktacau:1950: vṛndā - bho naṭa-pravara madhumaṅgala! asmac-cakravartinyām atrāyātāyām api tad-āhlādanārtham ātma-priya-sakhasya hāheti-ḍhakkā-vādyena
GR14muktacau:1952: ṣaṭ-pado bhavan uḍḍīyoḍḍīya bhramarikām ādadānaḥ sphuṭam ito raṅgād asmād adhikam uddaṇḍaḥ tāṇḍavayann anena dvipada-gopena sārdhaṃ sugahanaṃ nandīśvara-goṣṭham āpsyasi |
GR14muktacau:1953: tadānīṃ tad-avalokanād vayam api cakṣuḥ-sāphalyam utsphārayiṣyāmaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1954: tato'haṃ vihasya - nāndīmukhi! seyaṃ candramukhī sāmañjasya-ratā
GR14muktacau:1957: ato vinā mūlyenāpy asyai santuṣṭena mayā mauktikāni deyāni |
GR14muktacau:1958: kintv iyaṃ mantra-vidāṃ mūrdhanyā tataḥ śvaḥ paraśvo vā parama-śuciḥ
GR14muktacau:1959: satī rahaḥ sthānam āgatya snānādinā parama-śucaye
GR14muktacau:1961: yatheha vṛndāvane gopenaiva mayā surādhikā-śrī-drutam eva labhyate |
GR14muktacau:1962: tataś candramukhī kuṭilaṃ mām avalokayanty āha - aho mām api hitopadeśinīṃ kṛtānabhijñas tvaṃ kadarthayitum udyato'si ? nāhaṃ tava mantrābhijñā
GR14muktacau:1966_0: bhavad-upakaṇṭha-vartinī mañjulataraikāvalir ekā sasmitam ālokayantīnām āsāṃ samakṣam eva paramotkaṇṭhite mad-urasi sneha-bhareṇa
GR14muktacau:1966_1: svayam eva tvayā yady adhīyate tarhi mūlyam antareṇāpi bhavad-abhīṣṭa-mauktikāny avaśyaṃ vitariṣyāmi |
GR14muktacau:1969: mayi sā māṃ tiryag-avalokayantī huṃ kurvatī kiñcic apasasāra |
GR14muktacau:1970: rādhā ca sasmitaṃ kurvatī ātmani śaṅkām ādhāya sambhramam avāpa |
GR14muktacau:1971: tato viśākhā tarjany-aṅguṣṭha-choṭikayā nāndīmukhīm abhimukhīkṛtya netra-kūṇanena raṅgaṇamālikā-tulasike darśitavatī |
GR14muktacau:1974: raṅgaṇamālikā-tulasike tāṃ vinā-kṣaṇam api kutrāpy avasthātuṃ na śaknuvatas tad
GR14muktacau:1975: anayor muktā-mūlyaṃ nirṇīya tūrṇam ete tad-antike prasthāpaya |
GR14muktacau:1979: vihvalīkṛtam iva māṃ sneha-vihvalā raṅgaṇamālikā mad-urasi
GR14muktacau:1982: tataḥ sarvāsu hasantīṣv avanata-mukhyau te viśākhā-pṛṣṭha-lagne babhūvatuḥ
GR14muktacau:1986: tato'haṃ - sā yūtheśā mat-savidham āgatya cet svayaṃ nirṇayati |
GR14muktacau:1992: mayoktaṃ - rādhā-viśākhayor advaitād dvayor api mad-atīva-priyayor yat kiñcin mūlyaṃ kathyate tac chrūyatām |
GR14muktacau:1997: tan-madhura-vadana-sudhākara-pravīṇa-naṭa-pravarau yugapat pṛthag vā mṛdu mṛdu tāṇḍavaṃ samullāsayantau mad-ānanda-kandaṃ kandalayatām |
GR14muktacau:2006_0: ākṛṣṭa-dara-kaṭhinībhūta-surabhi-kuṅkuma-paṅka-milanād īṣad ghanīkṛtya tena mṛdu mṛdu rūṣite mama pulakita-vakṣasi mat-prāṇa-pañjara-śārikā
GR14muktacau:2017: mauktika-pradāna-nimittaka-vitathā-vāk-prastutyāsmān sabhāsadaḥ kartuṃ saṃrakṣya prakāreṇa viḍambayitum udyuktāsti |
GR14muktacau:2018_0: tad atra raṅge yasyā raṅgo vidyate sā kila kulavatī sādhvī sphuṭam asya catuḥṣaṣṭhī-kalā-vidagdhasya naṭasya lāsyam atropaviśya
GR14muktacau:2018_1: paśyantī bhadreṇa kula-dvayam utkīrtayatu ahaṃ tu gṛhaṃ gacchāmi tato nāndīmukhī -sakhi viśākhe! asya narma-karmaṭha-śīlasya
GR14muktacau:2019: vacana-vilāsa-mātreṇaiva kathaṃ nirvidya khidyase ? kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha |
GR14muktacau:2020: niḥsandeham adhunaiva muktā dāpayiṣyanty asmi iti tām ābhāsya nivartya ca mat-savidham
GR14muktacau:2028: tato'haṃ - nāndīmukhi! yadyapi rādhā mayi kāṭhinyam eva santatam ātanoti,
GR14muktacau:2029: tathāpi sahaja-snigdhasya mama manas tu tan-nāma-mātra-śravaṇād eva nāṅgam eva samastaṃ drutam anusandhatte tadānu tat-sahacarīṣu kāṭhinyena kim ?
GR14muktacau:2032: tāvad eva tat-suvarṇālaṅkāraṇādi-raupyādi-rasādi-priya-gavādikaṃ dhanaṃ mayi sthāpyatayā mayi saṃrakṣya etad-anurūpa-kiyan-mauktikāni gṛhṇantu |
GR14muktacau:2033: ity ābhāṣya punaḥ kṣaṇaṃ maunena vimṛśyāha - nāndīmukhi!
GR14muktacau:2034: santata-dayita-gocāraṇa-līlayā vane vane bhramatā mayaitat sarvaṃ kutra
GR14muktacau:2040: vinā etat kim api na sampadyata eva |
GR14muktacau:2041: nāndīmukhī - mohana! etad apūrva-mūlyaṃ kutrāpi na dṛṣṭaṃ na vā śrutam
GR14muktacau:2043: tato'haṃ - vidagdhe nāndīmukhi! īdṛśam etad bhūmi-jātāpūrva-mauktikaṃ
GR14muktacau:2044: tvayā brahmāṇḍe kutrāpi dṛṣṭacaraṃ śrutacaraṃ vā asti ? tad-apūrva-padārthasya
GR14muktacau:2046: tatrāpi na vayaṃ muktā-vyāpāriṇaḥ kintu kevalaṃ bhagavatī-pādānām ādeśena bhavad-āgraheṇa cātra pravartitāḥ smaḥ |
GR14muktacau:2047: tasmāc ced icchā syāt tarhi mitho nirdhārita-mūlyaṃ prastutaṃ dattvā parama-caturā
GR14muktacau:2051: divaso jātas tad vayam api godhana-sambhālanāya govardhanaṃ gacchāmaḥ |
GR14muktacau:2052: tato nāndīmukhī sanirvedam iva lalitāntikam upetya anuccaiḥ - sakhi
GR14muktacau:2055: tataḥ adbhuta-tapasvini! tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti nāndīmukhīm ākṣipya māṃ prati lalitā smitvā - dhīra-lalita yuvarāja!
GR14muktacau:2060: lalitā-viśākhādi-sakhī-maṇḍalīnāṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni tathaiva nirmāya pṛthak pṛthak sampuṭe nyasya tat-tan-nāma-mudrayā cihnitīkṛtya tathaivāgrathitāny apy
GR14muktacau:2067: praṇaya-rūpa-gandha-candanair vara-tāmbūlaiś ca subalādikaṃ ca santoṣya
GR14muktacau:2071: praṇayādhikyena tan-mālya-bhūṣitas tat-tāmbūlam upayuñjānaḥ sakhībhiḥ saha
GR14muktacau:2073: tataś ca svarṇa-sampuṭaṃ samudhghāṭya lalitā tad-alaṅkaraṇena sānandam ānanditāṃ rādhāṃ prasādhayāmāsa
GR14muktacau:2078_0: tat-pracuratarādbhuta-mauktika-pradānena sva-sva-patiṃ sva-sva-gurūṃś ca paraṃ santoṣya punar gāndharvā-saras-tīra-gāndharvā-sthānīm
GR14muktacau:2085: hāhā yāsyati dṛk-pathaṃ mama punaḥ puṇyair agaṇyair iha ||
GR14muktacau:2086: iti kṣaṇaṃ maunam ālambya punaḥ sautsukyaṃ -
GR14muktacau:2090: maj-jīvātur iyaṃ mayā punar aho hā hā kadā lapsyate ||
GR14muktacau:2091: iti vilapan sāśru-dhāras tal-līlā-smaraṇa-vihvalaṃ bhūmau nipatya sa-śabdaṃ
GR14muktacau:2092: rudantaṃ madhumaṅgalam āliṅgya tad anu - prāṇa-vallabhe! tvam eva jīvātu-rūpā
GR14muktacau:2093: rādhāsīti sa-kampaṃ sa-gadgadaṃ lapan tāṃ satyāṃ pariṣvajya muhur muhur
GR14muktacau:2094: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca uccair niśasann āsīt |
GR14muktacau:2095: satyabhāmā ca - sambhrameṇa sāśru-romāñcā nija-śāṭikāñcalena taṃ vījayantī tūṣṇīm āsīt
GR14muktacau:2096: ity akhila-vṛttāntaṃ paurṇamāsī-śiṣyā samañjasā-mukhād ākarṇya saromāñcaṃ sakautukaṃ savyathaṃ lakṣmaṇā prāha - sakhi samañjase! tatas tataḥ ?
GR14muktacau:2097: samañjasā -- tataḥ prathamam atisambhrameṇa kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā tad anu -
GR14muktacau:2098: prāṇanātha! nikhila-vraja-janaika-jīvana! jaya jaya dhairyam avalambasva dhairyam avalambasva
GR14muktacau:2100: bhāṣamāṇayā muhur muhur vijanena mṛdu mṛdu madhurāṅga-mārjanena
GR14muktacau:2101: gokula-gamanārtha-prārthanādibhir eva nija-jīvita-nāthaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ sandhukṣitīkṛtya nijānanta-sukha-sudhā-sindhūn nijānanta-prāṇa-parasparām
GR14muktacau:2111: atyutkaṇṭhitayam api dvārakā-purābhibhāvanārtham abhisaṃrakṣya tatrabhavatī śrī-bhagavatī-pāda-padmān puro nidhāya sārdham uddhava-rohiṇīśvarībhyāṃ
GR14muktacau:2113: tat-kṣaṇād eva drutam itaś calitvā śrīmatā nandīghoṣa-rathena
GR14muktacau:2116: ājamānaḥ san śrīmati nija-vraja-pure śubha-praveśam avaśyaṃ kariṣyatīti sudṛḍhaṃ sarva-sammatyā nirṇītam astīti tat-pariveśita-madhura-samācāra-sudhāsāram ānandāsāra-samplutā
GR14muktacau:2120: samañjase! etan-madhura-rasa-vārtāśravaṇād atīva utkaṇṭhitāhaṃ śrī-yādavendreṇa sārdhaṃ goṣṭhendra-goṣṭham avāpya
GR14muktacau:2122: samañjasā - sakhi tathaiva sarvathā bhavatu bhavatyā iti |
GR14muktacau:2123: ādadānas tṛṇaṃ dantair idaṃ yāce punaḥ punaḥ |
GR14muktacau:2125: yasyājñā-sudhayā prabodhita-dhiyā muktā-caritrair mayā gucchaḥ puṣpa-bharair vyadhāyi ya iha śrī-rūpa-saṃśikṣayā |
GR14muktacau:2127: ghrāṇais taṃ paribhūṣitaṃ na tanutāṃ tat-keli-śīdhūtka-dhīḥ ||2||
GR14muktacau:2132: tasya kṛṣṇa-kavi-bhūpater vraje saṅgatir bhavatu me bhave bhave ||4||
